story:
According to the latest report of the United Nations Development Program, approximately 1.5 billion people in 91 countries are suffering from poverty. 800 million people face the threat of poverty. Although the latest data in the report shows that the number of poor people around the world has decreased, increasing inequality and wrong structural arrangements continue to pose a major threat.

Abdoulaye Mar Dieye, President of the United Nations Development Program (UNDP) Bureau of Africa, has promising initial statements on the report. "Africa is enjoying economic growth and greater prosperity. Over the past three years, success has been achieved in the areas of income, health services and education," says Dieye.

The fastest economic growth was recorded in Rwanda and Ethiopia, according to a new UN Development Report. These countries are followed by Angola, Burundi and Mozambique.

However, there are not only positive developments in the report. Africa's Sub-Saharan region is still the largest gap between rich and poor in the world. 585 million people in the region, 72 percent of the population, are either poor or threatened with poverty.

story:
Our family.
Together we are 4 years old. Acquainted in the kitchen. Dmitry is a cook, and Alexander is an assistant chef.
We are already thirty years old and we are thinking about our future.
The other day we decided to ask for political asylum in the United States.
Because we want to be able to get married and live without fear for our future.
Here we work without regret, but the salary is often not paid.

Dmitry was dismissed twice from work when they found out that he was gay.
We have a small loan. We are trying to save up for the departure, but we can not.
We decided to ask for help from you. Maybe there is a person who will give us a second chance. Chance for a full life.
We dream of marrying in California on the ocean, holding hands.

Almost every day I cry. Imagining how we get married, we have a son and a dog.

 

We sincerely believe in the miracle and want to thank everyone. We have almost no friends and we would like to invite everyone who will help us to our wedding. May God protect you!

We are trying to save up for the departure, but we can not.We decided to ask for help from you. Maybe there is a person who will give us a second chance. Chance for a full life.We dream of marrying in California on the ocean, holding hands.Almost every day I cry. Imagining how we get married, we have a son and a dog. We sincerely believe in the miracle and want to thank everyone. We have almost no friends and we would like to invite everyone who will help us to our wedding. May God protect you!

story:
WHO WE ARE:: 

Because we believe that helping animals in need is not only a responsibility of life but it is what gives life a meaning, and because we believe that a person's most useful asset is a heart full of love, we took a personal initiative and founded a dog shelter in May 2017. Ever since then, we have been doing our best to care for the uncared for, love the unloved, and provide a safe environment for as many dogs as we can.

 WHAT WE DO::

 Our mission is to show the world that animals are not disposable and that their lives matter and should be valued.

 THE PROBLEM:: 

We had a beautiful shelter in Kahale, that we built from scratch. Our dogs were safe there, until Kahale Municipality, and some residents decided to pull off an ugly dark scheme, and fabricate false complaints to have us out.

 NOTE:: 

Dogs are safe, we rented a land with an indoor and an outdoor area, and we will stay there until we fix our new permanent shelter. 

WHAT WE NEED::

 We are out of the shelter with our dogs, and now are trying to build a new shelter as soon as possible before the rain. We solely rely on donors, and are now counting on you! There is no government funding for animal charities in Lebanon and we rely on the generosity of donors to help us care for all the disadvantaged, abused and unwanted animals in our care. Unable to donate? You can still help! Even if you can’t spare any cash for a donation, you can still make a big difference to our campaign by spreading the word!

 SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE

Ever since then, we have been doing our best to care for the uncared for, love the unloved, and provide a safe environment for as many dogs as we can. WHAT WE DO:: Our mission is to show the world that animals are not disposable and that their lives matter and should be valued. THE PROBLEM:: We had a beautiful shelter in Kahale, that we built from scratch. Our dogs were safe there, until Kahale Municipality, and some residents decided to pull off an ugly dark scheme, and fabricate false complaints to have us out. NOTE:: Dogs are safe, we rented a land with an indoor and an outdoor area, and we will stay there until we fix our new permanent shelter. WHAT WE NEED:: We are out of the shelter with our dogs, and now are trying to build a new shelter as soon as possible before the rain. We solely rely on donors, and are now counting on you! There is no government funding for animal charities in Lebanon and we rely on the generosity of donors to help us care for all the disadvantaged, abused and unwanted animals in our care. Unable to donate? You can still help! Even if you can’t spare any cash for a donation, you can still make a big difference to our campaign by spreading the word! SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE SHARE

story:
Short Summary

Let's not beat around the bush, we all know that the recent developments in the political sphere are very concerning for the future of our planet. 

  • The United Kingdom voted to leave the European Union after being misled by a campaign of lies, which was followed up by a horrendous hike in hate crimes.
  • The USA has just voted for a President who during his campaign openly discriminated against women and many, many minorities. His rhetoric was quite frankly scary.

These two major changes indicate that many people have given into a rhetoric of fear that lacks little (if any) factual backing. Furthermore, the two campaigns went against experts' advice, and both demonised immigrants, who are often among the biggest contributors to a flourishing society.

Therefore, we propose to unite people who wish to stand up against the hateful rhetoric we are seeing with far too much regularity. 

Together, with your help, we would like to buy a private island and develop it in an environmentally friendly way. This would lead to us being able to establish a society that believes in social harmony and condemns hate. While very few people have the resources to do this alone, together, as a group, we could contribute to one of the most exciting projects in world history. A project that indicates how we want the future of humanity to look. 

While I may have started this as sort of a joke, the more I write, the more I feel convinced that we should do this!

  • We cannot stand by and watch sections of our communities get told that they are inferior to anyone else because of their skin colour, sexuality, gender or religion.
  • We cannot stand by and watch our planet destroyed by the reckless combustion of fossil fuels without sustainable plans to move to cleaner energy.
  • We cannot stand by and watch other animals suffer changes in their habitat because of our laziness and unwillingness to change.

Through establishing a community on an uninhabited island that believes in equality and wants to work together, we can show the world just what humans of all backgrounds can do when we work together.

What We Need & What You Get

This bit is not going to be easy:

  • With just over $25,000,000US we can buy a large enough private island whose equivalent area in London is home to over 100,000 people. Therefore with that amount of money we could buy an island big enough to support a relatively decent sized community.
  • After buying the island, any amount we receive would be used to survey the land, its biodiversity and plan to build on it in an environmentally friendly way. This would lead to establishing a currently unknown number of residencies and business premises so that the island becomes self-sufficient.

What will be interesting is, if this project takes off, it is very possible that other businesses may decide that they want to help and as a consequence the project will take off even more.

The Impact

At first this project seems farfetched but the more you read about it, the more you'll probably want it to come true. Here are some of the impacts we would expect:

  • Sustainable development of an island.
  • The advancement of environmentally friendly practises.
  • Send a message to divisive politicians that so many of us believe in a better society.
  • If we manage to get this project off the ground, it will show that so many of us desire a society that does not discriminate against people for their race, sexuality or gender.
  • A new way of life for many people.
  • Hope that we can achieve the unachievable.
  • Enriched campaign for equality.
  • If all else fails, at least spark a debate.

Risks & Challenges

Let's be serious here, this will by no means be easy, even if we meet the target amount. Here are some of the risks and challenges that we can foresee: 

  • Target not met - if our target is not met, all contributions will be returned.
  • Unable to buy island - the owner may not want to sell to us.
  • Time to construct area where people can live sustainably may take a long time.
  • Potential inability to construct enough residences for all contributors.
  • Potential lack of jobs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign, even if you do it in a satirical manner. 

A £5/$5/€5 pledge may not seem like much, but it all adds up, and you never know, we may be able to do it with a lot of "let's see what happens" sort of pledges.

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for reading this and let's see if we can do it!

Unable to buy island - the owner may not want to sell to us.
Time to construct area where people can live sustainably may take a long time.

And that's all there is to it. Thank you for reading this and let's see if we can do it!

story:
Child Slavery Is Still Happening Today

Most people think slavery is something we just read about in history books. NOT TRUE!

  • There are an estimated 5.4 victims of modern slavery for every 1000 people in the world.
  • This includes 16 MILLION people in forced labour in the private sector, mostly due to indebtedness!
  • We believe that freedom from servitude is a basic human right and that education is a key to breaking the cycle of poverty and bringing hope for further generations. Children engaged in brick kiln slavery because of family indebtedness is an abomination.

Cubinero, Inc. is a 501(c)3 non-profit which provides grants and microloans to pay off these debts so that they can be released from bondage and purchase equipment to start their own businesses. We are an all volunteer organization, so 100% of donated funds will go directly to helping those in need.

We Assist Families With Grants & Microloans To Escape Their Lives Of Misery

  • The average family can be liberated for $500 or less!
  • A startup business for rescued families can be funded for around $3000
  • We aim to initially assist 10 families to escape these horrible work camp conditions
  • Any funds over and above our initial project goal will be used to liberate more brick kiln slaves

The Impact

  • These modern slaves are often beaten, and abused emotionally and sexually without any legal recourse available to them. THEY ARE PROPERTY!
  • We have already assisted a local organization with sewing machines to open a sewing center to train & assist women & girls with a productive vocation
  • We have recently purchased a taxi for a local family in the Punjab region to provide an income for them
  • We would like to use funds raised here to help 10 families to utilize their current skills & purchase equipment for their own brick forming business:
  • Please help these poor individuals with the gift of freedom!

Risks & Challenges

  • Our contacts in Pakistan place themselves in jeopardy everyday to champion the cause of those in hopeless bondage.
  • Brick kiln owners don't like to lose their cheap labor source, so they use every means possible to discourage our workers and to intimidate those in bondage.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell others about brick kiln slavery and raise awareness about this problem
  • SHARE THIS PROJECT ON ALL OF YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA SITES, PLEASE!

story:
What is our story?

We founded Art For Education to bring art and learning together to help improve education in small communities around the world.

We are a group of artists who work hand in hand with small schools and NGOs to help them build and create stronger schools by selling fine art prints.

 Each year we are holding a worldwide campaign where we create one of a kind pieces of art for our project, themed around the country and community we are working with.

We are working with different organizations and NGOs around the world to help raise money for their schools and community educational projects.

Our amazing artists this year: 

John Horne
Amelina Jones
Anouk
ATJ
Carol Goodchild
Akris
Ana Mitrovic 

Why education and our goal

Every time education is improved somewhere in the world, more opportunities are created and seeds are planted for a bright and thriving future. 

This year we are working with three NGOs:

Moyo Wa Huduma - Kenya 

The Chosen Vessels  - Kenya 

Caring For Children In Uganda - Uganda 

We are hoping to raise 500 euros for each school, we will be sharing all the funds we raise evenly between these three NGOs, each one of them works tirelessly to protect, care and provide education to the children in their communities. If you would like to find out more about each NGOs personal mission in depth you can find more information on our Instagram @art.foreducation. 

Where will your funding go?
 (After making costs 1.5€) 100% of the revenue from the prints will be going to the three NGOs so that they can continue to grow and become stronger. There is a list of some general things that your money will be going towards: 

- A portion will go towards buying new equipment and supplies, tables, chairs, paper, pens, etc.

- Purchasing items for the local community and children. 

- Improving WiFi and electricity installations. 

What You Get
- A5 fine art prints of your choosing.

-The chance to help impact these local communities.

Your Impact
By offering this kind of education and support to the community and schools you are helping them grow their mission and work. 

By buying one of our art prints, you become a drop of water after a hot summer, giving that little extra nutrient to the soil, helping the schools and NGOs grow stronger and taller to face the year ahead, creating an unbreakable foundation to face whatever comes in the future. 

Asante sana  (thank you so much for your time)

​

​

story:
My friend is a queer black woman in the Caribbean who was severely injured in May. She hasnt been able to work or generate income since. Shes a dedicated community organizer for the queer community on her island and has kept working through injury and poverty. She's too proud and humble to ask for help so I am asking for her !!

This fundraising is to help her keep afloat and survive... She has to keep a roof over her head and eat while she is not working and does not get any sort of unemployment or disability ! She supports the community for free so it is time to support her when she needs us! Show up for queer balck women organizers !!

She supports the community for free so it is time to support her when she needs us! Show up for queer balck women organizers !!

story:
In becoming President of the United States, Donald J. Trump is joining some illustrious company: Lincoln, Eisenhower, JFK. However, based on what we know about his personality and management style, three other names seem more likely to be closely associated with him. And those three names are not ones mentioned in the same breath as freedom and tolerance. 

"Those who fail to learn from history are doomed to repeat it" is a quote often thrown around, but at no time in our lives has it been more important to heed the message contained within it. Early signs such as Mr. Trump's transition team and cabinet picks give us a window into his first term, and the view is disconcerting to say the least; CEOs, Wall Street banksters, Russian apologists, white nationalists, pay-to-play billionaires, etc. Another quote from one of our featured dictators seems incredibly apt here as well. Mr. Mussolini is rumored to have said “Fascism should more properly be called corporatism, since it is the merger of state and corporate power.” Well, he was right about one thing. 

What We Need & What You Get

You get a quality, poly-cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) t-shirt from American Apparel. They're hand screen-printed in a shop in San Francisco, California, just off Haight and Ashbury, and made in America. That's more than we can say for Donald's ties.

To get these printed, we need orders for at least 100 shirts at $30 each. With $3000 raised we can cover shirts and printing, as well as time and materials for design, copy, shipping and handling.

Any additional funds (minus time and materials) will be donated to the ACLU to help fight to keep our liberties intact.  

The Impact

In utilizing a fashion-based medium, the impact happens in the place that is often off limits to outside political arguments; the mind of anyone who sees you. Immediately, they're confronted with a message that requires some thought and intelligence to even understand. It's a guilt-by-association inference that throws down the gauntlet and says "this is how bad it could be if we're not vigilant." 

Risks & Challenges

Without a doubt, this message is polarizing. After all, there are not that many other Adolf's we could be referring to. As a result, people may be reluctant to buy and wear these shirts. If so, the project may die. If we don’t sell enough shirts your money will be refunded, it won’t cost you a dime, and we’ll be bummed. But, whatever happens, the biggest risk is doing nothing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Speak up. Defend freedom and the rights of all human beings. As Martin Niemoller* said:

First they came for the Socialists, and I did not speak out—
Because I was not a Socialist.
Then they came for the Trade Unionists, and I did not speak out—
Because I was not a Trade Unionist.
Then they came for the Jews, and I did not speak out—
Because I was not a Jew.
Then they came for me—
and there was no one left to speak for me.

If only more people had been wearing clever t-shirts...

(Full disclosure: we added that last line)

Relevant Links

Today We Saw a Live Performance from an Aspiring American Dictator​
Charles P. Peirce - Esquire - On Donald Trump's Jan 11, Press Conference

Family sitting on gold thrones promise they have interests of all Americans at heart

Bill Gross Says Donald Trump Reminds Him of Benito Mussolini

Trump Proudly Quotes Fascist Dictator Mussolini Who He Calls An ‘Interesting’ Person

Historians: Trump Demagoguery Mirrors Il Duce Mussolini​

How Journalists Covered the Rise of Mussolini and Hitler

Seven times the media compared Trump to Hitler​

Donald Trump's ex-wife once said Trump kept a book of Hitler's speeches by his bed

Trump’s Victory Tour First Of Its Kind Since Hitler’s Nuremberg Rallies

QUIZ: WHo said it? Trump, Hitler, Moussolini, or Stalin?

Robert Reich: 15 warning signs of impending Trump tyranny

Fourteen Defining Characteristics of Fascism

Donald Trump's Constitution

Unprecedented Imperial Powers Will Soon Pass into Trump's Hands

* Martin Niemoller (1892–1984) was a prominent Protestant pastor who emerged as an outspoken public foe of Adolf Hitler and spent the last seven years of Nazi rule in concentration camps.

story:
Make a difference with #Zito! 

We are a team of Mexican students that wants to change the reality of millions of people suffering from the refugee crisis around the world. We already began in our own country with refugees coming from Central America.

Our work began since October las year, when we found within the refugee crisis in Mexico the opportunity to make a difference. We took the challenge with the purpose for creating an impact with an issue that exists all around the world in refugee camps and asylums: LACK OF EMPLOYMENT followed by SANITATION & LACK OF FOOD. 

In our country 92% of the refugee seekers that enters, come from Central America. 

Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala are countries with the highest number of desplaced people, due to the extreme violence present in their territories. 

The number of asylum requests in Mexico increased 164% from 2014 to 2015, and every year that number gets higher. 

This year they are 65.3 million refugees in the world. And the UN Refugees Agency increased its budget to aid refugees and immigrants in Mexico to 210%, due that it expects for the situation to get worst.  Mexico is now a place of thousands living with hope, but those waiting their request for sanctuary live with less than 2 dollars per day. We discover the potential they have to build and strengthen communities. 

We decided to start in Mexico before expanding to the rest of the world because our country has plenty of refugee asylums and camps that need assistance. Mexico is the main actor of the biggest refugee crisis from the last 15 years. Every year thousands try to seek asylum or cross the country. We are talking about millions of life projects put on hold and most of the people don’t count with the enough money to grant them safety during the journey, which might last more than 5,000 miles and human rights are compromised. 

We didn’t had to travel miles or board a plane to experience the actual situation, we only had to look around the corner in our city. We have grown up seeing this issue everyday of our lives, and we already had enough of the way people seeking refugee in our country are mistreated. We will increase their quality of life by using a source developed every second in our region: agro industrial waste. To be more specific, seeds. 

We developed a business model entered in connecting different elements, and in order to provide job opportunities throughout the seeds and clean the environment, we competed in the Hult Prize, and international social entrepreneurship competition. We managed to represent our university (Tecnológico de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey), representing Mexico at the regional round located in Dubai. We were the only Mexican team who achieved to raise awareness about the situation that is happening in our country. We were selected from +50,000 teams to live the experience. 

We visited different communities in our city (Monterrey), Guadalajara and Mexico city to validate and confirm our business model along with other elements of our initiative, re-structuring it several times to make it functional and sustainable. 

We developed the compromise of changing the reality of millions, beginning in our country. 

Even we competed in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and had incredible feedback from the audience, fellow participants and judges, we decided we didn’t want to end our journey there, we wanted to keep with our compromise to increase the quality of live of millions of people.

We Thank the Hult Prize Foundation and Clinton Global Initiative

Without the Hult Prize competition this project never would have come true. The Hult Prize was the opportunity for us to plant the seed that will turn into a resourceful tree. Thank you!

The Journey 

We believe that Life is a constan journey where we are able to enjoy every landscape, find ourselves, and search a life of freedom and good will. Everyone is searching for a purpose, and we found ours in creating ways to help others who already have that clear and are making an ever more difficult journey. 

We became the voice of millions who aren’t able to speak for themselves, they touched our hearts and we decided the regarding the difficulties, we want to change their reality.

We started Zito to make industrial processes simple and generate products that benefits refugees who we met in our way. Zito is for the Mexican way of describing something small, but we gave it a new meaning when we use something small to create a big change. 

How do we work?

We joined forces so they can make an income, receive benefits and improve their quality of life. While we give you a chance to be part of the movement. 

So we thought about something simple: seeds. In our region we discover that more than 12,000 tons of avocado seeds went to waste everyday. By washing, drying, and processing them, we are able to turn them into different hygiene and food products.

The way we generate the communities growth is a true collaboration between everyone. We work inside the places where refugees and immigrants are being hosted. They are able to decide the amount of work they can handle and thanks to our simple processes, they are able to spend little time in creating quality products.

They also receive workshops so they can become more competitive and self sustainable, and our in-house team designs the processes to match the needs that balance creation and empowerment. 

In Zito we know that one small action can make a big change, but to make that happen collaboration is the key. If more people join us in this campaign we are able to finish our products, expand our processes to more places, work with different seeds, and make big things together. 

We only need you, to make Zito a reality for millions. 

Join us! 

Fund, share this video and tell all your friends how they can help millions of people out of the refugee crisis by using seeds everywhere. 

With your donation we will start to change the lives of million!
story_txt: Make a difference with #Zito! We are a team of Mexican students that wants to change the reality of millions of people suffering from the refugee crisis around the world. We already began in our own country with refugees coming from Central America.Our work began since October las year, when we found within the refugee crisis in Mexico the opportunity to make a difference. We took the challenge with the purpose for creating an impact with an issue that exists all around the world in refugee camps and asylums: LACK OF EMPLOYMENT followed by SANITATION & LACK OF FOOD. In our country 92% of the refugee seekers that enters, come from Central America. Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala are countries with the highest number of desplaced people, due to the extreme violence present in their territories. The number of asylum requests in Mexico increased 164% from 2014 to 2015, and every year that number gets higher. This year they are 65.3 million refugees in the world. And the UN Refugees Agency increased its budget to aid refugees and immigrants in Mexico to 210%, due that it expects for the situation to get worst.  Mexico is now a place of thousands living with hope, but those waiting their request for sanctuary live with less than 2 dollars per day. We discover the potential they have to build and strengthen communities. We decided to start in Mexico before expanding to the rest of the world because our country has plenty of refugee asylums and camps that need assistance. Mexico is the main actor of the biggest refugee crisis from the last 15 years. Every year thousands try to seek asylum or cross the country. We are talking about millions of life projects put on hold and most of the people don’t count with the enough money to grant them safety during the journey, which might last more than 5,000 miles and human rights are compromised. We didn’t had to travel miles or board a plane to experience the actual situation, we only had to look around the corner in our city. We have grown up seeing this issue everyday of our lives, and we already had enough of the way people seeking refugee in our country are mistreated. story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Kas ir Kontraflovs un ko vēlamies panākt?

  • Kontraflovs ir hip-hop producentu un izpildītāju apvienība, mūsu zināmākais darbs ir debijas albums "SSB" (Sātans Sarkanos Brunčos), kas pieejams visās populārās straumēšanas platformās, kā arī youtube, itunes, u.c. 

 

  • Esam manījuši kā vairāki Latvijā slaveni un savās darbības nozarēs respektabli cilvēki izsakās nievājoši par LGBT cilvēkiem. Mums tas nešķiet pieņemami, tāpēc mēs vēlamies izmantot Kontraflovs platformu, lai nestu pozitīvu vēstījumu un atbalstītu LGBT tiesības!

 

  • Mūzika un mūzikas video ir ekspresīvs "instruments", lai nogādātu vēstījumu Pasaulē. Mēs ticam, ka "Pasaule Pieder Tiem, Kuri Mīl" video, kļūstot plaši populārs, nesīs pozitīvo LGBT mīlestības enerģiju katra cilvēka mašīnā, mājās, austiņās un pat publiskās vietās, kad šī dziesma tiks atskaņota. Tas rosinās sarunas par to, kā cilvēki publiski izsakās par mīlestību, kura tikai rada pozitīvo pasaulē un nevienam nedara ļaunu, veicinās jautājumu izskatīšanu par LGBT tiesībām un radīs papildus apziņu jauno cilvēku prātos, ka mīlestība nav vienveidīga, bet gan krāsaina!

Kas mums ir nepieciešams?

  • Esam jau izveidojuši dziesmu, strādājot augstākās klases ierakstu studijās, gluži kā ar jebkuru Kontraflovs ierakstu. 
  • Video radīšanai nepieciešami 600 EUR, lai to varam pabeigt pēc augstākajiem kvalitātes standartiem. No Jūsu atbalsta nosegsim: 
  1. Apgaismojumu, lai parādītu LGBT cilvēkus vislabākajā gaismā;
  2. Make-up, lai galvenie video dalībnieki lieliskajā apgaismojumā mirdzētu kā tam jābūt;
  3. Operatora darbs;
  4. Video montāža un pēcapstrāde;
  5. Papildus ekipējuma (optika, statīvi) noma.
  • Visi augstāk minētie punkti ir vienlīdz svarīgi, lai sasniegtu vislabāko rezultātu un "Pasaule Pieder Tiem, Kuri Mīl" video aizkustinātu cilvēkus, mudinot dalīties ar video un nest vēstījumu plašākai auditorijai. 

Jūsu atbalsta spēks!

Katrs atbalsts, ko Jūs sniedzat video radīšanai ir nozīmīgs! Aicinu citādi iztērētu naudu cigarešu paciņai vai citām precēm, kuras gremdē Pasauli un veicina negatīvo enerģiju, novirzīt pozitīvam mērķim un vēstījumam. Mēs katrs veidojam Pasauli mums apkārt, un kopā varam izveidot Mīlošu Pasauli!

Rezultāts!

Mūzikas video, aicinot cilvēkus atbalstīt LGBT mīlestību un tiesības TRENDING youtube? Kopā mēs to varam!

story:
Hi! We're Cue6 Theatre and we are a local, female-run, independent theatre company. We're producing a production of Ruby Rae Spiegel's Dry Land and we'd like your help!

At Cue6, we believe both in supporting artists, and giving back to the community. Our partnership with Planned Parenthood Toronto combines these goals, while raising awareness about urgent issues involving youth in Toronto. 

By donating to our campaign, you're supporting local arts and health, and contributing to two important local institutions.

 

Fund Allocation

  • 50% of your donation will be used by Cue6 to help cover production costs for the show. These include:
    • Set, costumes and props
    • Venue Rental
    • Artists' Wages
    • Marketing and Promotional costs
  • 50% of your donation will be donated to help support Planned Parenthood to keep fighting for choice. W

 

About The Play:

Dry Land is the first full-length play from American playwright Ruby Rae Spiegel. Spiegel was only 21 when Dry Land was shortlisted for the Susan Smith Blackburn Prize, and its premiere production received a five-star review from the New York Times, calling the play “remarkable... caustic, funny and harrowing.” Dry Land has gone on to receive acclaim across the US, UK and Australia.

 

Cue6 Theatre’s production, helmed by Dora Award-winning director Jill Harper, features an incredible cast of newcomers including Mattie Driscoll, Veronica Hortiguela, Jonas Trottier and Reanne Spitzer, as well as an award-winning design team including Simon Rossiter and Tim Lindsay.

Dry Land

September 5-22, 2018 The Assembly Theatre (1479 Queen St W.)

Previews September 5-6 | Opening Night: September 7

Performances are Wednesday-Sunday at 8pm

 

 

About Cue6 Theatre:

Cue6 Theatre strives to instigate change by creating an environment where audiences can safely investigate and challenge their own beliefs, building an intimate discourse between art and audience. We also work to promote the female voice, championing female playwrights and representing strong female characters on stage.

For more information, visit www.cue6.ca

About Planned Parenthood Toronto:

In October 2016, Planned Parenthood turned 100 years strong. Planned Parenthood was founded on the revolutionary idea that women should have the information and care they need to live strong, healthy lives and fulfill their dreams — no ceilings, no limits.


Today, Planned Parenthood is a trusted health care provider, an informed educator, a passionate advocate, and a global partner helping similar organizations around the world. Planned Parenthood delivers vital reproductive health care, sex education, and information to millions of women, men, and young people worldwide.

For more information, visit www.ppt.on.ca

story:
Legalfly is a cutting edge Mobile and Web App that was designed to streamline Attorney/Client Matching.  Here is what makes us different:

Our Website:

www.legalfly.net

Our Financial Projections:

www.legalfly.net/documents/financialProjections...

Our Vision:

Equal Access to Law 


Our Mission:

Making the legal experience streamlined, inclusive and fair to everyone.  Giving attorneys a chance to jumpstart their careers and make a difference in the lives of many Americans.

Our Features

-A mentorship platform to help young lawyers succeed

-We focus on non-complex transactions

-We aim to become the first fully virtual law firm platform

-We aim to become the first fully featured legal matching App

-Record low cost of representation by matching recently barred attorneys with underserved clients

-We will donate to pro-bono and other non-profit organizations

story:
Pourquoi cette campagne

Nous sommes persuadés que le digital peut vraiment devenir un outil de libération.

Nous sommes persuadés que nous pouvons lancer un modèle économique qui n’utilise pas les données personnelles de ses utilisateurs.

Nous sommes persuadés que nous pouvons avancer tout en respectant chacun.

Nous sommes persuadés que la publicité à outrance et ses modèles de régies intrusives doivent disparaître.

Nous croyons en la liberté de chacun.

Et vous ?

https://wegravit.com/

wegravit, la passerelle de vos usages digitaux

wegravit est une plateforme gratuite, intelligente et éthique, au service de tous.

Utilisez vos propres talents pour gagner de l’argent, organisez simplement votre vie sur un seul écran, découvrez, créez ou gardez le contact avec vos cercles relationnels.

Nous sommes persuadés que le digital peut rester un outil bienveillant. C’est pourquoi il n’y a ni publicité ni utilisation néfaste de vos données personnelles ou de celles de votre entreprise.

Notre objectif n’est pas de vous retenir pour vous noyer d’informations, nous préférons vous savoir en train de profiter de la vie, de votre famille, de vos passions, de vos projets, que scotchés à un écran. 

Comment ça marche ?

Gagner de l’argent avec ses talents

Pour recréer du lien social, en redonnant de la valeur aux personnes tout en faisant éclore les talents, nous avons développé un système unique de paiement agile. Ce système permet à chacun de proposer ses talents ou de poster une offre et donc, de payer et d’être payé sur la plateforme, simplement et sans délais.

Ce paiement s’articule selon une règle simple, une action validée, un paiement enregistré. Les traditionnels et problématiques paiements à 30 ou 60 jours disparaissent.

S’organiser simplement

Avec l’utilisation des groupes, auquel vient s’ajouter les "to-do lists" et les agendas interconnectés, il est possible d’organiser simplement tout type de projet. 

Que ce soit dans un cadre particulier ou professionnel, vous partagez l’information simplement, vous assignez des tâches, vous obtenez une visibilité complète de l'avancement de chacun. Vous priorisez mieux, vous gagnez du temps, vous redevenez acteur de votre vie digitale. 

Une plateforme universelle

Ne faites plus semblant, sortez des personnalités fausses et surjouées des réseaux sociaux actuels. Sur wegravit pas besoin de s’inventer une vie, il suffit d’être soi-même. 

https://wegravit.com/

Fonctionnalités

  • Agendas partagés
  • Messagerie instantanée
  • Publication de contenu
  • To Do List
  • Page d'accueil
  • Échange de fichiers
  • Profil pro/perso
  • Menu personnalisable
  • Portfolio
  • Contenu
  • Contacts
  • Agenda/todolist
  • Messagerie
  • Suggestions de contacts
  • Paiement agile
  • Suggestion intelligente
  • Portfolio
  • Groupes
  • Applications connectées
  • Barre de recherche unique
  • Liste de contacts
  • Partage de documents

A quoi servira la collecte ?

Assurer le développement de la Version 1.1 avec tout un tas de nouvelles fonctionnalités pour le premier trimestre 2018.

https://wegravit.com/

Ce système permet à chacun de proposer ses talents ou de poster une offre et donc, de payer et d’être payé sur la plateforme, simplement et sans délais.Ce paiement s’articule selon une règle simple, une action validée, un paiement enregistré. Les traditionnels et problématiques paiements à 30 ou 60 jours disparaissent.S’organiser simplementAvec l’utilisation des groupes, auquel vient s’ajouter les "to-do lists" et les agendas interconnectés, il est possible d’organiser simplement tout type de projet. Que ce soit dans un cadre particulier ou professionnel, vous partagez l’information simplement, vous assignez des tâches, vous obtenez une visibilité complète de l'avancement de chacun. Vous priorisez mieux, vous gagnez du temps, vous redevenez acteur de votre vie digitale. Une plateforme universelleNe faites plus semblant, sortez des personnalités fausses et surjouées des réseaux sociaux actuels. Sur wegravit pas besoin de s’inventer une vie, il suffit d’être soi-même. https://wegravit.com/Fonctionnalités

HELP REOPEN "NJWEEDMANS JOINT"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IRiW1JfOw5w&list=PLHBCFxfk0G08T4sy1InLnEOdYJkADCl_4

 

THE POLICE unjustly closed us - now we want to reopen:

What We Need: $20,000

Renewal of Business License - $300

Renewal of Health Inspection -$175

Business Insurance - $1,000

Workmans Comp., Ins - $1,300

Clean and remodel restaurant - $2,000

New Equipment - (display case/cold hot) - $2,500

Stock of Food - $1500

Stock of paper products - $500

Advertisements - $200

Signage - $2000

Electric Bill - $10,000

THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT - destroyed this business

For over a year beginning in early 2016 the TRENTON POLICE DEPARTMENT harassed this business and the owners because they wouldn't close at 11pm. FACTUALLY: The law did allowed them to stay open until 2am, but the police could not read or comprehend zoning and tax zones and illegal forced closures. When Edward filed a federal lawsuit March 2016, the police retaliated by filing a series of false bogus charges against him and unjustly jailed him from 3/17/17 -5/24/18 (447 days) 

THE POLICE ISSUED DOZENS OF TICKETS and harassed patrons....Later (2/6/2018) Judge rules THE POLICE were wrong. (DISMISSES TICKETS).

After being found "NOT GUILTY" on fake charges the Prosecutors office then dismissed the remaining fake charges. - ( PROSECUTORS DISMISS CHARGES)

 

_____________________________

NJWEEDMAN FOUND NOT GUILTY

_____________________________

NJ Weedman acquitted of witness tampering at 2nd trial

May 24th 2018

By Paige Gross pgross@njadvancemedia.com, For NJ.com

A jury found Ed "NJ Weedman" Forchion not guilty of witness tampering Thursday afternoon.

The marijuana activist raised his arms in victory after the jury read the verdict in Mercer County Superior Court in Trenton.

His supporters cheered, and with a smile on his face, he invited the prosecutor, John Boyle, to his victory party.

Before that, he asked the judge about the 400-plus days he's spent in jail awaiting, and during his two trials. The Weedman, though, had to go back to the Mercer County jail to be officially released.

"I guess it goes to show that you can be provocative or rub people the wrong way, but that's not a crime," his standby public defender Chris Campbell said after the verdict.

At his first trial in November, a jury acquitted him of one count of witness tampering, and was hung on a second, forcing this trial. He acted as his own attorney both times.

He said then, and repeated it at this trial, that he was just exercising his First Amendment rights when he sent packages containing letters and photos to the family of a confidential informant in the marijuana dealing case against him.

'Weedman' takes a knee in solidarity with Colin Kaepernick at start of trial

Ed Forchion kicked off his latest trial kneeling, an ode to ex-NFL quarterback and national anthem kneeler Colin Kaepernick

During his hour-long closing statements Tuesday, Forchion repeated to jurors sentiments of his opening statements. He claimed he always wanted the confidential informant to testify in his drug trial and that he didn't go against a protective order concealing the identity of the informant.

"At no time did I deliberately break this order, because there was no order," Forchion said.

He also said everything he posted on social media and mailed to the family of the informant was him "just exercising his right to free speech."

Forchion also asked the jury in closing statements that no matter what they decide, "please make it unanimous, so I'm not stuck in this place anymore."

Boyle, an assistant Mercer County prosecutor, told the jury in his closing statements that sending multiple packages to the family members of a confidential informant couldn't be construed as anything other than threatening. 

The first package, addressed to the father of the confidential informant, contained a letter stating "You've been served," and, "Give him s---, then give him this [package]."

Other packages were sent to members of the confidential informant's family, stating Forchion knew what kind of car they drove, where children in the family lived and multiple handwritten notes calling the confidential informant a "rat-fink b---h."

"In its totality, mailing after mailing, after mailing," Boyle said to the jury, "After reaching out to his mother, father, his wife, his neighbors, his sister. Who would ever come in (to testify) after this?"

Forchion still awaits trial on marijuana dealing charges, the case from which the witness tampering accusations stemmed.

In that case, Mercer County authorities raided his restaurant in Trenton in the summer of 2016 and arrested him and others on accusations he was dealing marijuana from the business - NJ Weedman's Joint, and an adjacent cannabis church, both on East State Street across from Trenton City Hall.

He had posted bail on that case when he was arrested and jailed in this, tampering case.

Paige Gross may be reached at pgross@njadvancemedia.com. Follow her on Twitter @By_paigegross. Find NJ.com on Facebook.

 

PROSECUTORS DROP REMAINING CHARGES

Cases against NJ Weedman up in smoke. Prosecutors cite changing views of marijuana

Ed "NJ Weedman" Forchion reacts to someone who beeped their horn in support as he talked in front of his shuttered restaurant Friday, May 25, 2018 in Trenton, a day after he was acquitted of witness tampering and was released from jail. (Kevin Shea | For NJ.com)

 

The Mercer County Prosecutor's Office announced Wednesday it will be dropping most of the remaining drug and related charges against Edward "NJ Weedman" stemming from a 2016 raid on his Trenton restaurant.

What is not dismissed will be downgraded to municipal court, where jail time is unlikely.

But Forchion's not seeing this as all good news. 

Late last month, Forchion was found not guilty by a jury on third-degree witness tampering charges - a case that also grew from the drug raid.

The marijuana activist spent about 15 months detained in the Mercer County jail during two trials, and was set free hours after he was acquitted.

The prosecutor's office said the decision to not move forward in prosecuting Forchion came after considering the shift in climate of marijuana legislation in New Jersey.

"They're about 10 years too late," Forchion said of a change in public opinion of marijuana. 

The office also considered the changes in law regarding the state's bail reform - an issue Forchion railed against during his time in jail.

"I'm half-way happy and half-way mad," he said Wednesday night. "Now the state just drops the charges, and I've already spent 16 months in jail. I had 42 charges against me total. It was a campaign of terror by the police department."

NJ Weedman spent 400-plus days in jail. Turns out he was not guilty

Can he get anything for all the time he spent locked up?

"These factors call for an adjustment in the way the office most appropriately uses its resources and assistance from other law enforcement agencies in order to prioritize detention cases such as murders, attempted murders and violent crime," the prosecutor's statement said.

"The fact that the defendant has served more than a year in prison while these cases were pending was also taken into consideration," it continued.

In all, Forchion had been indicted in 2016 and 2017 and was facing 11 charges related to narcotics dealings and cyber harassment. The prosecutor's office has dismissed most of the charges, and downgraded five to "disorderly persons offenses," all of which will be tried in Trenton Municipal Court. 

The state is currently wrestling with ideas of how to deal with the hundreds of thousands of people who have been charged with marijuana crimes. Some legislators are considering expunging low-level convictions, but aren't yet sure of the logistics. 

"After a review of the defendant's pending cases," the prosecutor's office said in its statement, "We feel the downgrade and dismissal of the charges is an appropriate resolution."

NJ Weedman spent 400-plus days in jail. Turns out he was not guilty

 

 OTHER STORIES

 

NJWEEDMAN is now out of jail and wants to re-open but doesn't have any cash......sure he has a LAWSUIT and will get tons of money in the future.  CAN YOU HELP OUT NOW?

 

AS A PERK BONUS he says anyone donating with get every dime back and a profit!! (SEE PERKs) 

https://www.facebook.com/NJ.com/videos/10155883631936234

HIS RESTURANT WAS DESTROYED, BY FALSE CHARGES AND A OVERZEALOUS PROSECUTOR.....NOW HE ASKS YOU TO PLEASE HELP HIM REOPEN.

 

LETS GET $20,000.oo up to reopen this restaurant that was shut down by the government unjustly and unconstitutionally. Stand up for freedom by helping NJWeedman reopen.

story:
Have you been moved by the viral #metoo stories?

Are you passionate about standing up for women's rights?

Do you wish women were more unified in the "fight" for peace and equality?

If so, then Birth of Reason is for you! Spread the word and wear the emblem proudly, because it has the power to bring strength and unity to us all!

 

 

Birth of Reason seeks to unify women through a shared symbol and to create an online marketplace where women’s organizations can come together as a community to sell their goods and garner support.

The Birth of Reason symbol is the perfect symbol to represent the women’s movement--the egg expresses women’s power of creation and nurturing, not just of children, but of meaningful thoughts and ideas, while the earth emerging represents the vast power of women to influence the world. We believe that our symbol will perfectly represent our values and serve as the heart of our movement in our pursuit of equality.

All of our efforts are focused on strengthening the women’s movement and helping it to gain further traction and momentum as women seek justice and equality around the world. Our brand new website already has some products available and there are soon to be many more as we continue to partner with other organizations. Visit us at www.birthofreason.com. By supporting our campaign you will be helping us jump-start the success of our marketplace and make valuable connections and partnerships with women's organizations around the world.

Birth of Reason promotes a vision of an international symbol for the women’s movement. This symbol is a mark of women’s infinite power and a talisman of love, peace and unity. Our overall goal is to spread this symbol around the world in order to instill a sense of global belonging and empowerment in women of all races, religions, and ages and to inspire healthy dialogue about the important issues we are facing. Birth of Reason will be a catalyst for a movement of change – our planet desperately needs the infinite wisdom of women to unify, to rise up and nurture our earth and our people.

We have learned and accomplished a lot since our initial Indiegogo campaign earlier this year. With the funds raised, we launched our new website and have begun building our global marketplace - an online store that will offer products made and manufactured internationally by inspiring women’s cooperatives and companies. These products will all feature the Birth of Reason emblem. We have already reached out to a number of organizations that are interested in working with us and these partnerships will financially support women’s issues such as education for girls, women’s health, human trafficking, female genital mutilation (FGM) and numerous other issues that affect women throughout the world.

From our first campaign, we learned that the Birth of Reason emblem deserves to be featured on more items than our egg necklace, and through this realization came our idea for a global marketplace. We also listened to customer feedback from around the world, and learned that our necklace needed to include both sides of the Earth in order to truly be a global symbol - so we are now offering the double sided egg necklace!

Any contributions to this campaign will help us form partnerships with Women's NGOs and be on our way to offering many more Birth of Reason products on our website.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising funds in order build our global marketplace and expand our product range. We will need to raise $2500 for the initial support of these efforts. All contributions to this campaign will go towards the development of our marketplace and the spreading our vision.

You can contribute to our campaign by ordering a necklace which we have in both double sided and single sided versions. We also have several other items featuring the BoR emblem if you are interested in contributing to our campaign but would rather wear the emblem in a different way. These items are temporary tattoos and patches! We have all of these items in stock and they will be shipped to your right away so that you can wear them proudly!

 

The Impact

There are a wide variety of issues affecting women today. Throughout the world, women are more likely to live under the poverty level, are more likely to be abused, and also make up the largest part of human trafficking. Women have health issues that are not given the proper funding, have fewer opportunities for education, and consistently lower wages than men, among many other inequalities.

All of these issues are intimately related, and working as a unified whole to address them will help us make more progress on each of them. Currently, we are approaching each of these objectives separately, and what we need in order to make progress is unity.

By creating a unifying symbol, we can build a movement faster and with more power than we ever imagined. Symbols have always been one of the most important ways to communicate belief and affiliation. Icons you see every day often hold powerful meaning. No one questions what you are trying to say if you put your county's flag up on a national holiday, march in a rally with a large peace sign on a banner, or have a rainbow flag flying at your door. Throughout history, countless movements have gained momentum under the influence of unifying symbols.

In order to achieve the unity our cause requires, we need a symbol to match the strength of our values and the strength of our numbers. The heart of our movement is about nurturing (and demanding) empowerment, freedom, education, and opportunity for women throughout the world and ensuring that women’s perspectives are heard. Currently, the women’s movement is lacking a symbol that ties us together, and consequently, we are lacking the collaboration we need. Birth of Reason seeks to remedy both of these issues by promoting a symbol with the power to unify all women and create a sense of collective purpose.

The Birth of Reason symbol is the perfect symbol to represent the women’s movement--the egg expresses women’s power of creation and nurturing, not just of children, but of meaningful thoughts and ideas, while the earth emerging represents the vast power of women to influence the world. We believe that our symbol will perfectly represent our values and serve as the heart of our movement in our pursuit of equality.

Because of this, and our desire to create a truly inclusive and global movement, we’ve decided our signature necklace needs to show all sides of the globe. Our previous design was a huge hit, and we need your help to make this one an even bigger success. Your assistance makes it possible to include all the continents, and further, to dedicate more resources to building our marketplace, which helps more women across the globe.

 

Risks & Challenges

Popularizing the Birth of Reason emblem may be challenging for us, as our success depends on mass exposure and the global adoption of this symbol as the official symbol for the women’s movement. However, we believe that if we move forward with passion and integrity and continue to develop partnerships with powerful women and other influential organizations, our message will be heard and we will be able to achieve our goal helping women gain global unity and a shared voice.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to support our campaign and we welcome them all! If you can’t contribute by ordering a necklace, patch, or tattoo, please consider sharing our campaign with your friends. Any likes or shares through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc. would be very much appreciated!

Do you have a connection or idea that you think would help us? We would love to hear from you!

No one questions what you are trying to say if you put your county's flag up on a national holiday, march in a rally with a large peace sign on a banner, or have a rainbow flag flying at your door. Throughout history, countless movements have gained momentum under the influence of unifying symbols.
In order to achieve the unity our cause requires, we need a symbol to match the strength of our values and the strength of our numbers. The heart of our movement is about nurturing (and demanding) empowerment, freedom, education, and opportunity for women throughout the world and ensuring that women’s perspectives are heard. Currently, the women’s movement is lacking a symbol that ties us together, and consequently, we are lacking the collaboration we need. Birth of Reason seeks to remedy both of these issues by promoting a symbol with the power to unify all women and create a sense of collective purpose.
The Birth of Reason symbol is the perfect symbol to represent the women’s movement--the egg expresses women’s power of creation and nurturing, not just of children, but of meaningful thoughts and ideas, while the earth emerging represents the vast power of women to influence the world. We believe that our symbol will perfectly represent our values and serve as the heart of our movement in our pursuit of equality.
Because of this, and our desire to create a truly inclusive and global movement, we’ve decided our signature necklace needs to show all sides of the globe. Our previous design was a huge hit, and we need your help to make this one an even bigger success. Your assistance makes it possible to include all the continents, and further, to dedicate more resources to building our marketplace, which helps more women across the globe.
 
Risks & Challenges
Popularizing the Birth of Reason emblem may be challenging for us, as our success depends on mass exposure and the global adoption of this symbol as the official symbol for the women’s movement. However, we believe that if we move forward with passion and integrity and continue to develop partnerships with powerful women and other influential organizations, our message will be heard and we will be able to achieve our goal helping women gain global unity and a shared voice. Other Ways You Can Help
There are many ways to support our campaign and we welcome them all! If you can’t contribute by ordering a necklace, patch, or tattoo, please consider sharing our campaign with your friends. Any likes or shares through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc. would be very much appreciated!
Do you have a connection or idea that you think would help us? We would love to hear from you!

story:
The common theme among white collar executives, attorneys, physicians and successful professionals who confided their story to me in prison was that they never thought what happened to them could occur in America.  Once they were indicted it was too late.  An individual who is indicted has 1 chance in 500 of walking free.  Like the Jews in Nazi Germany denied that the holocaust could ever occur, my obligation is to inform our citizens of the risk to their welfare from a government that views its productive citizens as a never ending source of revenue.  The destruction of lives and families is immaterial in an Orwellian morality wherein every American is a potential target.  Those who are over-the-radar because of their success become prime targets.  

I seek in a two hour theatrical performance in two acts to depict the evil in our U.S. Department of Justice where a single, unelected, assistant U.S. attorney has the power to crush any American.  Cheating, lying, coercion and outright thuggery are the modus operandi of the FBI.

Of my 10.5 years in prison, 16 months were confined in a maximum security section of the Harris County Jail where I never saw the sun and never left my 6x10 foot cell when my crime consisted of waiving copays so my patients could receive their treatment for hepatitis C and the making of a profit in the private practice of medicine.  I relate torture inflicted on me in retribution for each of 4  attempts to commit suicide.   

This story is a unique and vital wake up call by someone who is an accomplished public speaker who can orate for 2 hours with no notes and will relate directly to the audience.  I seek $1 million to bring this story to the stage in Houston, Texas and then move it to either off-Broadway or the Broadway stage.

The funds will be used for my salary of $250,000 per year, a producer, wardrobe, makeup, theater expenditure, advertising, acting and voice lessons, legal and accounting for this project.

story: Se escribirá un libro en formato digital contando la historia de la creación de campañas en red para enfrentar problemas específicos como el vencer la falta de cobertura mediática, el ataque de bots y también se cuenta el apoyo a varios movimientos sociales en México y en el extranjero desarrollando técnicas de comunicación en red para potenciar los efectos.

story:
THANK YOU FOR VISITING OUR CAMPAIGN!

We really appreciate your consideration and time.  Any amount that you can contribute is so greatly appreciated and would help us out tremendously.  Rest assured that your contribution is making a difference in the lives of rural Senegalese children.

 

About the Baobab Senegal Education Initiative

Our Vision is Empowerment through education. 

And our Mission is to support girls and women from rural Senegal in realizing their educational aspirations at all levels.  https://www.senegaleducation.org/

 

About this Campaign

This campaign is part of a May 2021 fundraising activity that includes a lot of other fun things going on - such as an online auction, a live Zoom presentation on May 23, and more!  To learn more about the full May 2021 fundraiser, visit here.

Your donations here include opportunity tickets as part of our Perks for our opportunity prize drawings on May 23rd.  Winners need not be present at our fun live event, but we will need to make sure to have your name and contact info to let you know that you have won.  If you donate here after our event, you won't get opp tix, but we will be so very grateful for your generosity!

 

Birth Certificates in Rural Senegal

Birth registration is the continuous and permanent registration of births and their characteristics in a civil status register, in accordance with applicable national legal requirements.

According to statistics from the National Agency for Statistics and Demography (Ministry of the Economy, Finance and Planning, 2015), nearly a quarter of children (23.8%) aged between 1 and 9 years old have neither birth certificate nor supplementary judgment.  

 

The Impact: Consequences of Non-Registration

A interruption or delay in a child's education:

  • Children without a birth certificate cannot attend school as enrollment in a school requires the presentation of a birth certificate. Even if a child is accepted into a school on a good faith, they will not be able to take the final exams and prevented from progressing.
  • As a result, schools end up with many exam candidates excluded due to lack of identification.
    • According to the Director of Examinations and Competitions, in 2015 and 2016 alone, over 85,000 "candidates for the CFEE (Certificate of end of elementary studies) and the BFEM (Certificate of end of middle studies) were without a civil status certificate. If these thousands of candidates do not manage to obtain a birth certificate before the end of year exams are held, they are forced to wait for the following academic year to take the exams."

The loss of their right to health:

  • In Senegal, the non-registration of a child implies an absence of the right to health care: without a birth certificate, a child cannot be treated or be vaccinated in a health center.
  • Children without an identity can be harder to reach by healthcare workers, and are often overlooked in public health plans even when the health coverage is universal.  

Exposure to early marriage for girls:

  • Girls who do not have their birth certificate lack certain protection against early marriage.
  • Additionally, the health consequences such as early pregnancies can be particularly damaging.
  • Birth registration is important as a means to facilitate monitoring and supporting the implementation and enforcement of minimum age of marriage laws in Senegal.

 

Challenges: Causes of Non-Registration

Ignorance

  • The situation of non-declaration of births results from the negligence of those who's duty it is to declare the child, parents in particular. But these parents are often ignorant of the requirement as many of them do not have birth certificates themselves, especially in rural areas (APS, 2015). 
  • Additionally, free registration of births is ignored by a majority of the population who assumes that birth registration requires payment. The law, however, mandates that the declaration is free and that the tax must be paid only for obtaining the civil status certificate (decree W 89428 of April 22, 1989).

The low level of education 

  • It has been consistently observed that a parent's education level affects the health and well-being of their family. This also applies to birth registration. In fact, parents who have attended school are more likely than those who have never been to school to better understand the procedures and modalities of birth registration.
  • Furthermore, the complexities and intricacies of the laws are often known and understood only by an informed public, made up of legal professionals and practitioners. In these circumstances, a population that is largely illiterate lack awareness the existence of the standard, let alone its content.

Poverty

  • The prevalence of poverty in certain rural areas hinder some parents from prioritizing the declaration of the birth of the children. Indeed, children from the wealthiest backgrounds are more likely to be registered in civil status registers, which confirms the link between poverty and the birth registration rate.

Geographic barriers:

  • The location of a town or village and their distance from registration centers have a significant impact on birth registration. In other words, longer distance from registration sites correlates to a decrease in birth registration. This is often due to the inability for the nursing mother to travel during the prescribed time or the economic burden presented by requiring the father to be away from work during an extended period. The burden is increased by the cost of travel.

 

Project Objectives

Goal: Contribute significantly to the resolution of civil status problems in the regions of Fatick and Diourbel in order to encourage children from rural areas to be enrolled in school at the normal age.

Specific objectives:

  • Strengthen the capacities of intermediaries, coordinators and civil status actors in 20 municipalities made up of 10 villages on average in each;
  • Inform the populations about the mechanisms for declaring births;
  • Put in place sustainable capacity for providing the information necessary for solving civil status problems;
  • Facilitate the organization of fairground hearings in partnership with the municipalities in order to allow unregistered children to obtain birth certificates.

 

Project Activities and Targets

This project consists of carrying out an awareness campaign and capacity building activities in the rural areas most affected by the problem of the non-registration of children in civil status. As part of this project, we will start with a pilot phase by choosing 10 municipalities in the region of Diourbel and 10 in the region of Fatick.

 

The choice of these two regions is based on statistics showing that they are part of regions whose level of possession of birth certificates is below the national average according to the ANSD- 63.4% for the birth certificate and 16.3% for the supplementary judgment (a decision taken by the court to replace an authentic birth certificate that a person must obtain either it was not delivered or was lost).  Indeed, in Diourbel, 25.4% of people (264,668 persons) do not have a birth certificate, and 16.7 % (114,337 persons) in the Fatick region.

 

Expected Results of the Project

  • Strengthen the capacities of intermediaries, facilitators and civil status actors in 20 municipalities made up of 10 villages on average each;
  • Sensitize the populations of rural areas on the mechanisms of birth declaration;
  • Make available appropriate tools and resources for parents, school directors and village heads to declare the births of newborns in a timely manner;
  • Facilitate the organization of fairground hearings in partnership with town halls to provide unregistered children to obtain birth certificates.
  • Significant increase in timely declaration of births and the obtaining of birth certificates in regions served. 

 

Timeline and Budget

  • We hope to begin the pilot phase of this project in Q3 of 2021, and anticipate that activities for this pilot project will end Q4 of 2022. 
  • Our overall budget proposal is $19,800 - any way that you can help is so greatly appreciated and would help us out tremendously.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Baobab-Senegal-Education-Initiative-Inc-350402509165860/
  • Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/baobabsenegaleducation/
  • Check out our website: https://www.senegaleducation.org/

 

THANK YOU!

 THANK YOU!

story:
What is this project?

This is a research project which going to discover the basic root of violence against women in west provinces of Afghanistan. 

I try to do research to find ways of fighting against misogyny in the society, and to create a movement against this unfair phenomena.  After completing this research, I will be able to understand the best way of standing equality, marginalization of women and hatred. This will enable us to create a belt of volunteers to start working on this project to pursue human rights and women development. 

A wide range of survey will be launched in west zone of Afghanistan purposefully in the center of the predicted provinces (Herat, Farah, Ghor, Badghes) to find out the current status of afghan women by specific self-questionnaires, in order to discover the better way of fighting against misogyny, hatred and violence in the society. The audience will be selected randomly from rural, urban participations. The aim of the paper is to discover causes of marginalization, and find out adequate solutions to reduce gender based discrimination, classed-education and gender segregation.

What will be the impact?

The findings of this research will be reflected in national and international medias to stimulate NGOs, and people to raise their voices and to consider human rights and women rights in their personal lives. 

After creating a group of youth activist against violence, of course it will be prevented from such cases as fallen during previous years, and we will not witness anymore such cases. 

This cases happened during past years: Nuqramah, a 21 years girl who was brutally murdered around the middle of Aug 2018 in Charsada District of Ghor Province by her nominated fiance (a person who was not her actual finace but tends to marry her by future) just because of going alone to the nearest hospital for taking some medication for her health problem.

Or the burning of Zahra who was burned on July 2016 by a family violence in Ghor Province or the stoning of Rokhshana who was stoned by Taliban in Sharia (The Islamic laws of giving verdict) just because of denying her force marriage with a man far age older than her. Or the murdering of a pregnant girl who was gunned by her husband families that even after a medical operation found the 6th months pregnancy was also injured in womb of her dead mother in Badghis province in the beginning of 2018. All these troubles lay out on the practiced hatred of femininity within the society and less awareness of the women from their actual rights. There are hundreds reported and non-reported cases of burning, poisoning, beating, honor killing, stoning, and murdering of women from west provinces of Afghanistan specially in Ghor, Badghis, Farah and Herat Provinces. This research tends to discover the root of violence not only socially but textually from the belief system of the community and the practical traditions, as it has a distinct link to the religious perceptions of the society.

Your assistance will help me to raise my voice against these all challenges and to switch a movement against these problems in order to change the mindset of people as positive as possible.

Don't hesitate to donate as much you can!

Yours,
