story:
Why Police Stings

I'm creating PoliceStings.com not because I hate cops or feel they don't have a roll in our society. In fact, good cops are critical to a successful society. Bad cops however are destructive to society since it creates distrust and hate towards the people we need protecting us. There is an epidemic of bad cops in America. Police in America are often protected even when they violate our rights, murder innocent people, and abuse anyone who won't bow to their demands. They treat their badges like crowns an expect you to bow down to their demands no matter how unconstitutional those demands are. If you don't comply, you will likely be abused verbally, financially, and/or physically. Your property will likely be seized and tickets will be used to punish you financially. In many cases, cops don't care if the case is ever taken up by the courts. Putting you in jail for a weekend is plenty of satisfaction for you not bowing down. On many occasions I have had nearly a dozen police surround me and verbally berate me as they walk around my vehicle looking for some reason to seize my property. All because I flex my Constitution right and refuse to be victimized. Let's unite, learn together, and fight back together! Police abuse can be stopped! I've had police tell me they're scared of what my system will do if enough people learn about it. That's a good thing! If they've done nothing wrong, they have nothing to worry about!

The Video That Started It All

CLICK TO VIEW

The goal of Police Stings:

  • We will use the same sting operations that police use. We'll create police stings to catch bad cops in the act of abusing our rights. We'll have professional equipment set up to record audio and video of the stings. If the cop proves to be a good cop, we will highlight that and let the world know. Good cops need to be given credit when they actual protect and serve us. If they aren't good cops, we'll flex our power using state and federal laws.
  • When abusive cops are caught in a Police Sting, we'll file civil lawsuits against those cops. In California, (where we plan to operate Police Stings) we have a civil code (CCC 1708) that states every citizen (including cops) have an unwritten contract to not violate each others rights or property. When a cop abuses someone unconstitutionally, they aren't acting within their police powers and aren't protected from civil action. Police Stings will sue those cops as individuals not as police officers. Police officers can legally violate our rights. If individual state laws don't provide an option to sue for violations of rights, then we will turn to to the federal statutes. 42 USC 1983 allows for anyone (other than judges) to be sued in federal court if they violate any of your rights.
  • To help individuals gather evidence of police abuse, PoliceStings.com will create an app that allows you to record police officers. You have a constitutional right to record police while they perform their public duties. In the case Fordyce Versus The City Of Seattle, The federal appeals court (United States Court of Appeals for the 9th Circuit) upheld your right to record a police officer in the line of duty. That means it's your right to record a cop and if that cop violates that right, you can sue them.

    Because police have a habit of shutting phones off before escalating thing, it is critical that phones stay on to document the abuse. The app we are creating will lock the phone's systems, preventing it from being shut off.  The video and audio will be streamed live to our servers and recorded remotely should there be a need for future legal action. The app will only allow the phone to be shut off if the owner enters a password. No longer will police be able to shut your phone off once the abuse starts (I've had them do it to me). If a cop shuts your phone off, it becomes your word against theirs and the courts will almost always take the side of the police officer. It is critical that we prevent this from happening, so we can document the abuses.
  • With your support, the funding raised will be used to file lawsuits against bad cops. During the lawsuits we will document each step of the process, creating a step by step DIY (do it yourself) process that allows even the poorest among us to file their own lawsuits against abusive police. We'll show you how to get waivers for court fees. Teach you what documents you need to file and when you need to file them. We'll give you a list of motions to file that will drag out your case and drain the financial resources of the officer being sued. We'll provide word for word statements you can use while in court to make sure you present your case correctly to the courts.
  • Finally, your contribution will help us build the PoliceStings.com website so we can create a resource hub to educate the public and help them defend themselves. Our website will have legal documents, lists of attorneys who want to join the cause, videos of our Police Stings and a blog to help us all communicate with each other.

We need your support!

It is time for us all to unite and stop this abuse before it rips our communities apart any further than it already has. This isn't about race. All races are being abused by cops. It's about community and preventing our neighbors from being abused.  I encourage you to support us as we set out to protect the weakest among us. I accept that if they killed that teenager in Hercules, Ca for a phone, then they may kill me for "holding a suspicious item" in my hand. I accept this and I will continue to record them and fight back until they do.  Every dollar helps us reach our goal, but obviously, the more you help the more we can do. 100% of your support will go to creating everything we listed above. Thank you for helping us as we try to help others!
story_txt:
Why Police StingsI'm creating PoliceStings.com not because I hate cops or feel they don't have a roll in our society. In fact, good cops are critical to a successful society. Bad cops however are destructive to society since it creates distrust and hate towards the people we need protecting us. There is an epidemic of bad cops in America. Police in America are often protected even when they violate our rights, murder innocent people, and abuse anyone who won't bow to their demands. They treat their badges like crowns an expect you to bow down to their demands no matter how unconstitutional those demands are. If you don't comply, you will likely be abused verbally, financially, and/or physically. Your property will likely be seized and tickets will be used to punish you financially. In many cases, cops don't care if the case is ever taken up by the courts. Putting you in jail for a weekend is plenty of satisfaction for you not bowing down. On many occasions I have had nearly a dozen police surround me and verbally berate me as they walk around my vehicle looking for some reason to seize my property. All because I flex my Constitution right and refuse to be victimized. Let's unite, learn together, and fight back together! Police abuse can be stopped! I've had police tell me they're scared of what my system will do if enough people learn about it. That's a good thing! If they've done nothing wrong, they have nothing to worry about!The Video That Started It AllCLICK TO VIEWThe goal of Police Stings:We will use the same sting operations that police use. We'll create police stings to catch bad cops in the act of abusing our rights. We'll have professional equipment set up to record audio and video of the stings. If the cop proves to be a good cop, we will highlight that and let the world know. Good cops need to be given credit when they actual protect and serve us. If they aren't good cops, we'll flex our power using state and federal laws. 
When abusive cops are caught in a Police Sting, we'll file civil lawsuits against those cops. In California, (where we plan to operate Police Stings) we have a civil code (CCC 1708) that states every citizen (including cops) have an unwritten contract to not violate each others rights or property. When a cop abuses someone unconstitutionally, they aren't acting within their police powers and aren't protected from civil action. Police Stings will sue those cops as individuals not as police officers. Police officers can legally violate our rights. If individual state laws don't provide an option to sue for violations of rights, then we will turn to to the federal statutes. 42 USC 1983 allows for anyone (other than judges) to be sued in federal court if they violate any of your rights. 
To help individuals gather evidence of police abuse, PoliceStings.com will create an app that allows you to record police officers. You have a constitutional right to record police while they perform their public duties. In the case Fordyce Versus The City Of Seattle, The federal appeals court (United States Court of Appeals for the 9th Circuit) upheld your right to record a police officer in the line of duty. That means it's your right to record a cop and if that cop violates that right, you can sue them. Because police have a habit of shutting phones off before escalating thing, it is critical that phones stay on to document the abuse. The app we are creating will lock the phone's systems, preventing it from being shut off.  The video and audio will be streamed live to our servers and recorded remotely should there be a need for future legal action. The app will only allow the phone to be shut off if the owner enters a password. No longer will police be able to shut your phone off once the abuse starts (I've had them do it to me). If a cop shuts your phone off, it becomes your word against theirs and the courts will almost always take the side of the police officer. It is critical that we prevent this from happening, so we can document the abuses.With your support, the funding raised will be used to file lawsuits against bad cops. During the lawsuits we will document each step of the process, creating a step by step DIY (do it yourself) process that allows even the poorest among us to file their own lawsuits against abusive police. We'll show you how to get waivers for court fees. Teach you what documents you need to file and when you need to file them. We'll give you a list of motions to file that will drag out your case and drain the financial resources of the officer being sued. We'll provide word for word statements you can use while in court to make sure you present your case correctly to the courts.Finally, your contribution will help us build the PoliceStings.com website so we can create a resource hub to educate the public and help them defend themselves. Our website will have legal documents, lists of attorneys who want to join the cause, videos of our Police Stings and a blog to help us all communicate with each other. 
We need your support!It is time for us all to unite and stop this abuse before it rips our communities apart any further than it already has. This isn't about race. All races are being abused by cops. It's about community and preventing our neighbors from being abused.  I encourage you to support us as we set out to protect the weakest among us. I accept that if they killed that teenager in Hercules, Ca for a phone, then they may kill me for "holding a suspicious item" in my hand. I accept this and I will continue to record them and fight back until they do.  Every dollar helps us reach our goal, but obviously, the more you help the more we can do. 100% of your support will go to creating everything we listed above. Thank you for helping us as we try to help others!

story:
• My name is Cesar Antonio Lopez Pereira. I’m 18 years old and I’m fromVenezuela
  • I study Aeronautical Engineering 4/8 and I’ve gotten recently a scholarship to do an Aircraft Technician Maintenance Intensive Course and I speak English since I was 16.
  • I only live with my Mom and my Sister(5 years). My mom is umployed

The Source of this Campaign

Hoy en día Venezuela, está sufriendo y experimentando la Inflación mas critica en la Historia de la Economía Mundial. El país se encuentra en decadencia en todos los aspectos. Desde que me gradué de Bachiller en el 2015 (15años) he tenido que desmejorar mi  calidad de vida como todo los ciudadanos que habitamos el país, la diferencia es que la solución para muchos ha sido emigrar emigrar al Sur de Latinoamérica en busca de una mejor vida pero allá tampoco   la tienen. La ayuda humanitaria que necesita mi país es evidente pero el Gobierno no lo acepta, lo cual no ha permitido recibir ayuda de otros países y realizar políticas que no contribuyen con el desarrollo del país. Recientemente se han implementado ciertas gestiones por parte del Gobierno para limitar la salida del país (control de régimen cambiario, altas tasas de impuestos  para obtener el pasaporte, obstáculos en la obtención de documentos).  Muchos llaman a este Gobierno régimen Dictatorial y es verdad, lo es. El Gobierno le hace ver a muchos países que todo esta bajo control y no es así. Cosas tan básicas como comer 3 veces al día, comprar ropa o tomar un autobús para  ir de un sitio a otro, ya no es algo común, los nuevos virus y enfermedades ya erradicadas por la OMS  han aparecido nuevamente (tuberculosis, difteria, sarampión, paludismo, malaria)  se han propagado lentamente, debido a las malas condiciones  de los hospitales, falta de medicinas y programas de atención sanitarias.

 Este ha sido el sistema de vida que me tocó vivir, pero no es el futuro que quiero por el cual me estoy esforzando.

Y he decidido hacer algo al respecto….

The Source of this Campaign

Today, Venezuela is suffering and experiencing the most critical Inflation in the History of the World Economy. The country is in decline in all aspects. Since I graduated from Bachelor in 2015 (15 years) I have had to improve my quality of life as all the citizens that inhabit the country, the difference that the solution for many has migrated to the South of Latin America in search of a better life. there either. The humanitarian aid that my country needs is evident because the government does not accept it, so it has not been allowed to receive aid from other countries and to carry out policies that are not related to the country's development. Certain rules have been implemented for the administration of the country (exchange rate control, high tax rates to obtain the passport, obstacles in obtaining documents). Many call this government dictatorial regime and it is true, it is. The government gives a look at many countries that everything is under control and it is not like that. Things as basic as eating 3 times per day, buying and taking a bus to go somewhere else, is no longer common, new viruses and diseases that have been wrong by WHO have appeared again (tuberculosis, diphtheria, measles, malaria, malaria). they have spread slowly, due to poor hospital conditions, lack of medicines and health care programs.

This has been the system of life that I had to live, but it is not the future.

And I have decided to do something about it ...

 

Por qué seguir estudiando en Venezuela?

Actualmente study Aeronautical Engineering 4/8 y estoy haciendo un curso intensivo de Técnico en Mantenimiento Aeronáutico. Como sabemos, estudiar en otro país no es tan fácil, las universidades son muy costosas pero aquí en Venezuela,  son gratuitas. Tomando en cuenta, que estudiar en cualquier parte del mundo Aeronáutica, es muy costoso.  Además voy por la mitad de la carrera, sería muy injusto abandonar la carrera e irme a otro país  en busca de  una mejor vida sin la garantía de poder estudiar y ser un profesional . Cada vez somos menos los jóvenes que estamos estudiando, muchos se han rendido y han considerado irse del país y abandonar los estudios. Cuando comencé la Universidad de mi matrícula 1-2016 éramos aproximadamente 35  alumnos por classroom y actualmente, somos solamente 3. 

Sin embargo, muchas veces intente aplicar para obtener becas en el exterior y fue imposible, solamente la universidad podía cubrir aproximadamente el 30% de la Beca y no tenía la cantidad de dinero suficiente y aún no he tenido ningún  tipo  de apoyo desde el exterior.

  Académicamente estoy preparado, poseo buen promedio de notas y me apasiona mi carrera, es mi sueño desde que era niño.

 

Why continue studying in Venezuela?

I am currently studying Aeronautical Engineering 4/8 and I am doing an intensive course in Aeronautical Maintenance Technician. As we know, studying in another country is not that easy, universities are very expensive and I do not have any family member abroad who supports me financially. And here in Venezuela the universities are free. Taking into account that studying in any part of the aeronautical world is very expensive. I also go halfway through the race, it would be very unfair to leave the race and go to another country in search of a better life without the guarantee of being able to study and be a professional. Every time we are less young people who are studying, many have surrendered and have considered leaving the country and abandoning their studies. When I started the University of my enrollment 1-2016 we were approximately 35 students per classroom and currently, we are only 3.

However, many times I tried to apply for scholarships abroad and it was impossible, only the university could cover approximately 30% of the scholarship and I did not have enough money and I have not had any kind of support from abroad.

  Academically I am prepared, I have good grade point average and I am passionate about my career, it is my dream since I was a child.

(Many students have decided to leave the country)

http://www.el-nacional.com/noticias/educacion/los-universitarios-abandonan-los-estudios-para-irse-trabajar_224544 

https://www.voanoticias.com/a/venezuela-educacion-estudiantes-profesores-docentes-educandos-abandono-estudios/4368198.html

Por qué necesito tu ayuda? - ¿Why do i need your help?

Con una inflación intolerable, la cesta básica de un hogar requiere de 44 salarios mensual solamente para alimentación. Lo cual se hace imposible para cualquier familia,  de ahí la frase, ESTAMOS SOBREVIVIENDO.  El apoyo financiero que requiero lo voy a utilizar para pagar mis gastos básicos, para poder seguir estudiando. Zapatos DEBIDO A QUE CAMINO 7KM diarios para ir a clases, ropa, alimentación, para sustentarme, libros, cuadernos, continuar y culminar mis estudios universitarios.

Tengo esperanzas en las nuevas oportunidades, trabajando en futuro como profesional en Aerolíneas, Repair Stations or  Empresas de Manufactura Aeronautica y Aeroespacial materializando mis proyectos innovativos y nuevas ideas para el mundo de la Aviacion. Luchar por mis sueños en cualquier parte del mundo, donde  mis estudios sean valorados y mis derechos humanos respetados

ESTOY ABIERTO Y CREO EN  LAS NUEVAS OPORTUNIDADES, QUE ME PUEDAN OFRECER PARA PODER SEGUIR ADELANTE.

  YOU MADE ME BELIEVER - DONT LET ME DOWN

With an intolerable inflation, the basic basket of a household requires 44 monthly salaries only for food. Which is impossible for any family, hence the phrase, WE ARE SURVIVING. The financial support that I require, I will use to pay my basic expenses, in order to continue studying. Shoes BECAUSE I WALK 7KM daily to go to classes, clothes, food, to support myself, books, notebooks, continue and finish my university studies.

I am hopeful in the new opportunities, working in the future as a professional in Airlines, Repair Stations or Aeronautical and Aerospace Manufacturing Companies materializing my innovative projects and new ideas for the world of Aviation. Fight for my dreams anywhere in the world, where my studies are valued and my human rights respected.

I AM OPEN AND I BELIEVE IN THE NEW OPPORTUNITIES, WHICH CAN BE OFFERED TO ME TO FOLLOW FORWARD

 

 

Get in touch with me:

cesarbusiness2@gmail.com

(+58) 0426-2350781

Instagram: this_iscesar

THANK YOU!!! GOD BLESS YOU

story:
Welcome to EmpwrData!

In our digital age, where personal data is the fuel of the U.S. consumer economy, most people feel strongly about protecting their privacy. Yet, they are often unaware of how they can benefit from the value of their data.

Milton Pedraza, Founder and CEO of EmpwrData, is a self-made entrepreneur and extremely passionate about helping you to harness the power of your personal data. This passion and expertise are the driving forces behind EmpwrData.

EmpwrData strives to help individual Americans gain full control of their personal data rights, and profit from its power to improve their lives, behaviorally and financially. 

It's Your data. Your life. Empowered.

 

OUR MISSION

At EmpwrData, we proactively advocate, educate and empower the collective voice and purchasing power of our members in the quest for personal data rights and economic prosperity. All human beings have the right to control their personal data to benefit their health, wealth and personal lifestyle. At EmpwrData, we protect, enhance and promote these rights.

Through Advocacy, we fight for personal data privacy and security rights for you and your family. We engage with government at the local, state and national levels to drive positive change. We strongly petition and influence business to do the right thing by their customers. We track the hot issues and innovations and alert our members of data privacy and security initiatives and progress.  

Through Education, we provide our members with highly curated content and resources on smart and practical ways to secure their data and protect their privacy now. We strive to be the most trusted, curated source for the latest insights and news about personal data privacy, security and economic opportunity. Over time, based on our unique expertise, we will even teach our members to benefit financially by licensing their legally protected personal data to brands at fair value.

Finally, we provide exclusive member Benefits through vetted and selected product and service partners who share our values. Our members can trust these partners to serve their best interests and needs when it comes to cyber security, privacy protection, data security, travel protection, medical services, and many other needs. Our partners offer high-value products and services at exclusive rates. Premium partners offer essential products and services for every individual and family, while Elite partners offer highly specialized products and services for individuals and families with unique situations.

Today, Americans need a trusted expert advisor to help them navigate the journey toward personal data rights and prosperity. EmpwrData is that trusted expert who will always serve your best interests. Still unsure? Learn more on why becoming a member will be empowering.

 

OUR MEMBERSHIP TIERS

We are undertaking a critical mission for EmpwrData members. You can join the movement in taking control of your personal data rights, security and privacy. Today, we are the only innovative, full advocacy, education and benefits organization that is empowering Americans’ personal data rights.

 

OUR PLANS

We are seeking $250,000 to achieve 4 key priorities. With the contributions we receive, we will:

1. Hire a team of renowned, top-tier attorneys who will represent member interests. They will drive EmpwrData's member advocacy initiatives with government entities and with the top digital platforms (Google, Facebook, Instagram, etc.)

2. Hire analysts and educational content curators. We strive to be your main source for the latest news and insights on personal data rights, privacy, security and economic opportunity. Essentially, we search for and develop critical insights, distill them, and share the best practices with our members.

3. Hire a Trusted Partner Manager who will scour the marketplace to find the absolute best partners that will serve the best interests of our members in terms of cyber security, privacy protection, data security, travel protection, medical services, and beyond.

4. Marketing to gain more passionate members who are eager to join the movement!

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

We are grateful for support at every level: $1, a kind word of encouragement, a referral, a share to your social page, advice, etc. 

And, for the entirety of our campaign, all contributors providing $50 or more will automatically become an Elite Member of EmpwrData (Value of $249/year). You will have complete access to all advocacy, education and premium and elite partners and preferred rate offers.

*To date, we are aligned with several key partners with agreements pending. Offers are not yet visible or available on our website. All will be available once agreements are finalized.

  • $50 - Elite Membership for 1-year
  • $100 - Elite Membership for 2-years
  • $250 - Elite Membership for 4-years
  • $500 - Elite Membership for 6-years
  • $1,000 - Elite Membership for 8-years

No matter how you help, we are excited to start this movement with you!

 

OUR IMPACT

With your help, EmpwrData will help Americans preserve their data privacy and regain the personal data freedom that is guaranteed by the U.S. Constitution. These rights are currently being eroded and undermined by data monopolists and brokers. EmpwrData’s work will reduce inequality and help Americans to gain full legal control to do whatever they choose with their valuable personal data assets.

The EmpwrData team is comprised of executives who have worked at the world’s top consumer brands and have track records of running successful brands and companies. For the past 17 years, Milton Pedraza, Founder and CEO of EmpwrData, has successfully and profitably run the most respected and trusted research, education, and consulting firm in the global premium and luxury goods and services industry. Our team’s reputation as ethical and effective experts for those we serve is unmatched. 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Through EmpwrData, we know that we are taking on well-funded and entrenched data monopolies and privacy and cybersecurity violators. That doesn’t concern us. Our mission for personal data rights for Americans is right and just.

We have the passion, the expertise, and the network of resources and partners to be successful in representing our members’ best interests. The emerging personal data economy, where our members will benefit, is an inevitable consequence of the accelerating digitalization of society. We know we are on the right side of history. Will you join us?

 

Thank you for visiting our page! To learn more, visit us.

Our partners offer high-value products and services at exclusive rates. Premium partners offer essential products and services for every individual and family, while Elite partners offer highly specialized products and services for individuals and families with unique situations.Today, Americans need a trusted expert advisor to help them navigate the journey toward personal data rights and prosperity. EmpwrData is that trusted expert who will always serve your best interests. Still unsure? Learn more on why becoming a member will be empowering. OUR MEMBERSHIP TIERSWe are undertaking a critical mission for EmpwrData members. You can join the movement in taking control of your personal data rights, security and privacy. Today, we are the only innovative, full advocacy, education and benefits organization that is empowering Americans’ personal data rights. OUR PLANSWe are seeking $250,000 to achieve 4 key priorities. With the contributions we receive, we will:1. Hire a team of renowned, top-tier attorneys who will represent member interests. They will drive EmpwrData's member advocacy initiatives with government entities and with the top digital platforms (Google, Facebook, Instagram, etc.)2. Hire analysts and educational content curators. We strive to be your main source for the latest news and insights on personal data rights, privacy, security and economic opportunity. Essentially, we search for and develop critical insights, distill them, and share the best practices with our members.3. Hire a Trusted Partner Manager who will scour the marketplace to find the absolute best partners that will serve the best interests of our members in terms of cyber security, privacy protection, data security, travel protection, medical services, and beyond.4. Marketing to gain more passionate members who are eager to join the movement! HOW CAN YOU HELP?We are grateful for support at every level: $1, a kind word of encouragement, a referral, a share to your social page, advice, etc. And, for the entirety of our campaign, all contributors providing $50 or more will automatically become an Elite Member of EmpwrData (Value of $249/year). You will have complete access to all advocacy, education and premium and elite partners and preferred rate offers.*To date, we are aligned with several key partners with agreements pending. Offers are not yet visible or available on our website. All will be available once agreements are finalized.
$50 - Elite Membership for 1-year
$100 - Elite Membership for 2-years
$250 - Elite Membership for 4-years
$500 - Elite Membership for 6-years
$1,000 - Elite Membership for 8-years
No matter how you help, we are excited to start this movement with you! OUR IMPACTWith your help, EmpwrData will help Americans preserve their data privacy and regain the personal data freedom that is guaranteed by the U.S. Constitution. These rights are currently being eroded and undermined by data monopolists and brokers. EmpwrData’s work will reduce inequality and help Americans to gain full legal control to do whatever they choose with their valuable personal data assets.The EmpwrData team is comprised of executives who have worked at the world’s top consumer brands and have track records of running successful brands and companies. For the past 17 years, Milton Pedraza, Founder and CEO of EmpwrData, has successfully and profitably run the most respected and trusted research, education, and consulting firm in the global premium and luxury goods and services industry. Our team’s reputation as ethical and effective experts for those we serve is unmatched.  RISKS & CHALLENGESThrough EmpwrData, we know that we are taking on well-funded and entrenched data monopolies and privacy and cybersecurity violators. That doesn’t concern us. Our mission for personal data rights for Americans is right and just.We have the passion, the expertise, and the network of resources and partners to be successful in representing our members’ best interests. The emerging personal data economy, where our members will benefit, is an inevitable consequence of the accelerating digitalization of society. We know we are on the right side of history. Will you join us? Thank you for visiting our page! To learn more, visit us.

story:
Having followed the situation in Gaza since 2007 it has gradually dawned on me that the 1.8m population must contain the highest proportion of amputees on the planet and that if anywhere should warrant a Chapter of e-NABLE it is amongst these siege burdened people.

 

Operation Protective Edge: The summer 2014 offensive on the Gaza Strip produced approximately one hundred new amputees among its residents. 

Early this year I saw this powerful video by Pink Floyd’s Roger Waters where he gives an example of a young lad who just wants to play football being shot 11 times in his feet. 

Then along came The Great March of Return ongoing since March 30th of this year and it has become totally apparent that Israel is using a different type of bullet:
 

“Dr. Bassam Al-Masri has tended to the wounded from the Second Intifada, plus the Gaza wars of 2008, 2012 and 2014.

"The bullet itself is different from before," he says. "We used to find intact bullets. Now we don't. We just find shrapnel."

Nodding to those waiting to see him, he adds, "Fifty percent [1,800] of those who were wounded will never walk naturally again. Not after a year or two or three or 10 years." 

From 2014 onwards there are now at least 130 amputees in Gaza.

 

I’d like to raise money for a fully functional Chapter of http://enablingthefuture.org/  in the Gaza Strip, Palestine. [“The e-NABLE Community is an amazing group of individuals from all over the world who are using their 3D printers to create free 3D printed hands and arms for those in need of an upper limb assistive device.

They are people who have put aside their political, religious, cultural and personal differences – to come together and collaborate on ways to help improve the open source 3D printable designs for hands and arms for those who were born missing fingers or who have lost them due to war, disease or natural disaster.”]

 

I have a friend in Gaza who works at The International Commission to Support Palestinians’ Rights he has assured us space for a printer and guaranteed consistent electric supply (no mean feat in Gaza!) Mahmoud has data on all the amputees in the region. 

 

I have been told we need a printer $500-1000 filament $40 per roll (enough for 3-5 devices), reliable electricity, $20 in other materials per device.

 

So I am looking for $2,500 start-up costs

story:
Attention friends!

We are here to attract your attention towards a snowballing problem. We solicit your help and support to assist Lebanese youths and refugees located in Lebanon, so that they can start something to earn from their own. Basically, we need to help them with seed money.  We have launched a robust platform for this noble cause under the name of Namllat.com. We are here not to help tens of thousands of needy peoples but the target is much beyond hundreds of thousands. To introduce ourselves, we at Namllat.com a Lebanese start-up have come up with an innovative Community Services Platform, creating a plethora of opportunities for the youngsters and refugees.  Knowing the present condition of Lebanon and its refuse problem, Namllat.com is offering various opportunities. By realizing the fact that, it’s a cruel and difficult world to survive, and even more difficult to find suitable jobs, especially in current difficulties in the Lebanese economic situation, we have many things to offer for the betterment of the society. In this respect, we request you to help us to cater the current needs of Lebanese Youths and Refugees. We just cannot leave them for dying from starvation or migrate to other country thus we are seeing refugees die on “Death Boats” daily. Please help us to succeed in directly help the community. We are offering various types of models apart from the regular jobs or even freelancing, through our platform. “Namllat” Online Freelancing Platform- with section especially designed to help Lebanese Community “Youth, Citizens & Refugees".

Ambition of Namllat

Our ambition is to provide a well-organized, easy to navigate, ethical, one stop online platform for Lebanese Youth, Citizens and Refugees job seekers for all types of jobs under one umbrella. It is an alternative to a full-time job which is very difficult to get. The Lebanese youth, unemployed citizens and refugees would act as “service providers” and community members would be acting as “Clients” through the Namllat platform, which is win - win situation for both.

Our USP

We want to give Lebanese Youth and Refugees free registration along with 140 USD as credit to start up their services. So, whatever fund is raised through this crowd funding will be used to help more and more needy Youths & Refugees. Our ultimate ambition is making our community respected and self-dependent. At the same time, the clients will be enlisted at the platform and will be able to get their work done by the service providers paving the way to lean toward the better economic status.

Impact

Namllat is dedicated in bringing out the best and most productive in our Lebanese Youth, turning disadvantaged of unemployed individuals into contributing community members. As an employer (community member), it offers employment opportunities in the form of part time positions.

We assist refugees to survive in Lebanon as hosting community, not travelling by death boats to Europe. Namllat vows to help those refugees directly or indirectly through the community services to avoid discrimination until the time come to return back to their countries.

The platform of Namllat not only encourages youth, but also provides the way they can pave their path for becoming an entrepreneur. This is guaranteed by the free registration as well as the free credit of 140 USD – it gives a way of efficient head start. Not only is the platform and this project beneficial for the unemployed youth, but it also makes refugees’ and Lebanese people’s lives much easier and utilize technology for their benefits.

The condition of Lebanon

With 164 refugees per 1,000 inhabitants in the small country is the densest and need immediate attention. Not only does the country have refugees from Syria, Iraq and Palestine, but there is also discordance among the people. This is owing to the facts that this refugee situation has burdened and pressurized the government on services and infrastructure, birthing a huge competition over jobs, leading to unemployment. Lebanon has a weakening infrastructure by now, with a large portion of people not even getting the life they wanted, starting from employment.

The Government of Lebanon is helpless on the onslaught of refugees from many countries around. It might be their duty to provide employment, but then, with such an economic instability in the region, the government can do nothing but become a silent spectator in the unfolding scenario. It doesn’t help the situation that Lebanon has been proclaimed as the quintessential country for providing refugee to the people who are in the desperate need of that. This has led to a high risk of social problems, including social chaos and unrest. It also doesn’t sound good when people say that 30% of the Lebanese graduates in the country are still looking for jobs.

 

What we need

If you cannot participate by giving money, we request you just to recommend your friends to participate with us, or share this on your social media. If not and you live in Lebanon just register on www.namllat.com/lebanon and get your work done along with helping unemployed Lebanese or Refugee “Note the Youth or Refugee will be clearly marked on our system”.


Namllat needs the help, not for themselves, but for the people. We must start this project as soon as possible “every minute counts for us to help more” The unemployed find this platform highly beneficial, as otherwise, not one of them could’ve found any way of getting employed and simultaneously support themselves and their families. The support and funds that the others would do, including you, would be promptly and swiftly given over to the unemployed youth students as free credit to start their career and earn some money which will directly affect their families and part of it will be for actual start up by recruiting some youth and refugees to start promoting namllat platform to their peers.

 

Needed:   70,000 $ Helping 500 Refugees and Youth (First Stage).

                   18,000 $ Recruiting 6 Lebanese Youth & Refugee to spread the word for 6 months.

                  5,000 $ Final Development of Namllat Platform.

Total    93,000 $

 
 

In nut shell

Namllat believes that suffering of even one human is suffering inflicted on whole of the humanity. One should willingly volunteer to stop such suffering when need occurs. Here, the Lebanese residents, comprising of youth, unemployed citizens and refugees, would be the one providing services – also known as service providers. The community members would then be acting as clients – as someone who needs their jobs done, from these service providers. Namllat platform will make it possible to help the unemployed as well as the people seeking job completion, through its provision of freelancing jobs.

So, on the behalf of the suffering Lebanese people and our community, namllat appeals you to join this noble cause – let’s transform the suffering country to a happy one!

VISIT OUR SITE

www.namllat.com/lebanon

Namllat In Media:

https://www.issuewire.com/namllat-utilizes-tech...

https://pressroom.prlog.org/namllat/

http://www.prfire.co.uk/namllat-utilizes-techno...

https://hype.news/namllatcom/namllat-utilizes-t...

 

Namllat in Social Media:

story:
Short Summary

My name is Krista McClure, and I'm the Inspired Director {Founder} of Detroit Parent Collective (DPC). DPC began as a wisp of a dream. Ultimately, Krista’s dream was to find a way to bring much-needed resources, in a safe space, to support families throughout Metro Detroit.

 

The launch of; Inclusion in a Developing Neighborhood, is critical because of the heavy lift that Inspired Director {Founder} Krista McClure of Detroit Parent Collective and it's Members are trying to achieve. We arrive each day with the intent to have an open mind + open heart so that way we can continue to grow + learn. 

 

By contributing to Detroit Parent Collective's; Inclusion in a Developing Neighborhood, you too will gain the gratitude that, I {as the Founder}, receive each day knowing that there are like-minded individuals who want to dismantle gentrification and support marginalized communities.

What This Village Needs And How We Want To Plug You In

Detroit Parent Collective needs to raise 20,000.00!

Believe me, we wouldn't be coming to you if we hadn't already exhausted all options
{Kiva, Personal Loans, Grants, etc.}

The repairs that are needed:

  • tuck pointing along exterior/ rear walls to prevent future water damage
  • external drain system along exterior/ rear wall (along foundation) to prevent future water damage
  • interior framing along exposed wall where previously damaged by wall
  • insulation + drywall where wall was previously damaged by water
  • installation of a sub-pump 
  • installation of hardwood floors in PreSchool Classroom where previously damaged by water
  • refurnish our "home"base!
    *within our Insurance Policy, there's a Water Exclusion Endorsement
    **our Insurance will cover the cost of replacing the Picture Windows

    With your financial support, a few things will happen:
    We Will CONTINUE to Love You Endlessly
    (because we are at the point of "go big, or go home")
  • For 25.00, we will send you a personalized card-- to include a picture from one of our Littlest Crew Member, within the Collective, their favorite activity (very likely our Atelier!)
  • For 50.00, we will send you a Tote with some Inspirational Words, such as: "When you think of the Future, plan accordingly for ours."- Kids Across The World. Because, who doesn't want a better world for our Littles?
  • For 100.00, we will package the Card + Tote together for you AND, add you (or your Business) as a Supporter to Detroit Parent Collective's Website!
  • For 500.00, we will package the Card + Tote together for you, add you (or your Business) as a Supporter to Detroit Parent Collective's Website AND name our Cooperative PreSchool in your honor!
  • For 1000.00*, well, we figure at this point you are a "Lifer" of Detroit Parent Collective and therefore a "shared" owner of the Buildings along Six Mile!
    *1000.00 buys you 1% of the Buildings, presently appraised at 60k each 
    *10% of this contribution will be "kicked back out" to the community in a way that supports the families or individuals in alignment with Detroit Parent Collective's Mission.
    *** YOU WILL STILL HOLD 1% of the Buildings despite the 10% Contribution to the Community
    *** Krista McClure {Promenade Detroit LLC} will provide to you a Contract for this "shared ownership". As a shared owner, you hold no say in; Selling of Properties or Landlord/ Lease dealings. 

Our {Collective} Impact

Detroit Parent Collective is designed to be inclusive of Detroit's families with a special emphasis on crossing barriers based on socioeconomic class, race and ethnicity. DPC is committed to offering a co-working space with onsite childcare and cooperative preschool, with supportive programming based on families’ expressed needs. While this work seems daunting, it's actually quite rewarding. Many of our Families (Collective Members) come from different walks of lives and that's what makes this space so beautiful! Without much effort we are removing barriers and finding similarities versus differences among each other. In other words, we are bridging two worlds; one where families would less likely have the opportunity or space to engage + learn from one another-- there's a very good chance that this is why we've been able to retain 90% of our Members since we launched mid-October 2017. {‌{Thank You Collective Members}‌}

Our Risks & Challenges

The reality is this: The Business Model {Detroit Parent Collective} is sustainable, and therefore is our asset and would do well in any community. However, this Business Model- designed to tackle gentrification and support marginalized communities- is needed in the community it was originally birthed; Bagley, Detroit. We've exhausted our "reach", including deep within our own pockets. It was clear to me on Sunday November 18th, after my buildings had been vandalized that this wasn't a vindictive move, rather a cry for Detroit Parent Collective, which had true meaning to "maintaining safe space", within a community that is rapidly developing and often leaving the voices + faces that need to be heard + seen, unheard and unseen. Some might suggest that the three young men who deliberately destroyed my picture windows are mischievous or a threat. However, my response is: "To the young men, or to the Parents/ Guardians of these young men, I'd LOVE for you to come forward. I'd LOVE to be able to put you to work from time to time. I'd LOVE to get your feedback on how to make Detroit Parent Collective inclusive to you. I know this gesture is rare, but so is this Business Owner."

Detroit Parent Collective is a Village.
If you too are like me, and have dug deep within your pockets only to find lint, no judgement!
The largest resource that one has is it's network-- so, please, share this campaign!



"My daughter goes to the Coop Preschool and we absolutely love it. All three of my kids love going there for any reason. Its nice to have such a wonderful welcoming community just around the corner from us."- S. S. (Bagley Resident)

"The space is beautiful and so much fun! I had a hard time getting my little ones to leave because they enjoyed their time so much. The staff is so kind and friendly! I love it and can't recommend this place highly enough!"- B. S. (Highland Park Resident)

"This place keeps me sane. It’s really true that “it takes a village...” and this place provides all that I would want in one." - J.Y. (University District Resident)

While this work seems daunting, it's actually quite rewarding. Many of our Families (Collective Members) come from different walks of lives and that's what makes this space so beautiful! Without much effort we are removing barriers and finding similarities versus differences among each other. In other words, we are bridging two worlds; one where families would less likely have the opportunity or space to engage + learn from one another-- there's a very good chance that this is why we've been able to retain 90% of our Members since we launched mid-October 2017. {‌{Thank You Collective Members}‌}

Our Risks & Challenges
The reality is this: The Business Model {Detroit Parent Collective} is sustainable, and therefore is our asset and would do well in any community. However, this Business Model- designed to tackle gentrification and support marginalized communities- is needed in the community it was originally birthed; Bagley, Detroit. We've exhausted our "reach", including deep within our own pockets. It was clear to me on Sunday November 18th, after my buildings had been vandalized that this wasn't a vindictive move, rather a cry for Detroit Parent Collective, which had true meaning to "maintaining safe space", within a community that is rapidly developing and often leaving the voices + faces that need to be heard + seen, unheard and unseen. Some might suggest that the three young men who deliberately destroyed my picture windows are mischievous or a threat. However, my response is: "To the young men, or to the Parents/ Guardians of these young men, I'd LOVE for you to come forward. I'd LOVE to be able to put you to work from time to time. I'd LOVE to get your feedback on how to make Detroit Parent Collective inclusive to you. I know this gesture is rare, but so is this Business Owner."
Detroit Parent Collective is a Village.If you too are like me, and have dug deep within your pockets only to find lint, no judgement!The largest resource that one has is it's network-- so, please, share this campaign!
"My daughter goes to the Coop Preschool and we absolutely love it. All three of my kids love going there for any reason. Its nice to have such a wonderful welcoming community just around the corner from us."- S. S. (Bagley Resident)"The space is beautiful and so much fun! I had a hard time getting my little ones to leave because they enjoyed their time so much. The staff is so kind and friendly! I love it and can't recommend this place highly enough!"- B. S. (Highland Park Resident)"This place keeps me sane. It’s really true that “it takes a village...” and this place provides all that I would want in one." - J.Y. (University District Resident)

story:
Short Summary

Set in Antebellum America a slave finds that his continued relationship with the white children that grew up with him are stronger than his desire to live a simple life. The result will have lasting effects on the history of the world.

story:
In September 2015, two creative friends living in Berlin wanted to pass the gift that is art to the younger generations and have a real impact on people’s lives. Their names are Sevin and Martin and they are the founders of Pass the Crayon. 

Pass the Crayon is a creative nonprofit organization that provides art workshops for refugee children in Berlin; seeking to empower these children by using art as a way of growing their social and emotional skills.

Over the past three years, Pass the Crayon has provided workshops to over 4,590 children* living in reception centers in the Berlin region. From a small team of two people, the organisation has flourished into a vibrant community of a thousand artists and volunteers*. Pass the Crayon has experienced amazing growth over the past few years and now we are ready to expand our work further and help more children discover the joy of art! 

Drawing by Maëlle Foix

What we need

For the past three years, we have dedicated all our time to building and growing Pass the Crayon from scratch. Running an organization based on voluntary support, with very little resources, can be very challenging. Nevertheless, we have overcome these obstacles and managed to flourish. We couldn’t have done this without the help of nearly a thousand volunteers and a solid core team. Their dedication along with the support from the welcome culture community has enabled us to connect with nearly 5,000 kids*. Next to the volunteers, we also established an advisory board that guides us throughout our journey. 

In 2018, we started to collect data in order to evaluate the impact of our program. We are using the Social Reporting Standard (SRS) to compose the report that will be released in the beginning of 2019. Our 2017 annual report shows that Pass the Crayon is growing, with more team members, volunteers and more kids attending our workshops.

Drawing by Maëlle Foix

Since we are a nonprofit organization, we depend entirely on external support. With the additional support we hope to gain through our crowdfunding campaign, we will be able to ensure our continued  growth and further improve our workshops. In order to achieve this, we are in need of €12000. We are confident that with your help, we will be able to reach this amount!

Most of the funds raised will be used to improve the quality of the workshops and to offer even more workshops to more children. And with the money raised, we can buy new art supplies, which enables us to offer more diverse activities to the children. Next to that, the support from this campaign will also enable us to expand our work and include more refugee children in the workshops. This will help us to achieve our ultimate goal of inspiring and nurturing the self-expression of as many young people as possible. One workshop for 15 children costs €45. Imagine how much more impact we can make if we raise €12000! 

Drawing by Maëlle Foix

 

What you get 

A part of the money raised will go into making and distributing our rewards. As a thank you for supporting Pass the Crayon and the children, we have some very exciting gifts for you! 

  • One of the gifts is a very special coloring book for children. The book is designed by Studio Satël and features drawings made by the kids during one of our workshops in 2016. The children were asked to draw people by giving them a list of combinations to make. For example: a girl + a big nose + a necklace or a boy + a dress + curly hair. 

 

  • Instead of the book, you can also opt for this tote bag featuring one of the drawings from the coloring book! This drawing has also been made by one of the children during one of our workshops in 2016 in collaboration with Studio Satël.

We are offering more exciting rewards, check them out on the right side of this page!

 

 

Other ways you can help

Even if you don’t have the resources to support us, you can still help us! You can share our campaign and spread the word about Pass the Crayon or even start volunteering for our organization!

 

Questions?  Please don't hesitate to contact us!

www.passthecrayon.com 

And feel free to email directly at: info@passthecrayon.com

Thank you for supporting us!

 

 

*Video credits: A massive thank you to Jamie for directing, filming and editing our campaign video and to Media Residents for letting us borrow the equipment!

*Pass the Crayon 2017 annual report

story:
Hi Everyone.

My Name Is Muhammad Ridzuan.  I Need 20K Money to rebuild my business.  Before this, some people sabotage of my business until I got bankrupt. 

I also have a child and wife to eat. If I did not do business again, I was ashamed of my son and wife. what do they want to eat? it all played in my mind. I'm stuck to get some money to build my business again.
 
I have made a personal loan with the bank, but the bank refused. if you see this ad, please give me a little money. 5 AUD per person is enough
 I really need your help.  May God Bless You All

Thank You. :)

story:
How are P.I.N.K. Backpack pocket guides unique?

  1. Convenience. Unlike traditionally long-winded parenting books, P.I.N.K. Backpack pocket guides are intentionally concise (both physical size and internal content) to make it easy for busy parents to find the information they need quickly. 
  2. Relevance. Each guidebook specifically addresses a recent women's rights issue.  For example, 'How to Help Your Daughter Understand Consent' was written in response to #metoo.

 

How does the pocket guide's physical size boost efficiency?

 

How do guidebooks take the guesswork out of raising successful daughters?

 

What are current and future titles?

 

Practical Examples?

 

Growth potential?

There are an estimated 250 million parents of growing daughters in the United States alone. Even more encouraging, the possibility to expand worldwide, include more age groups, and/or provide guidebooks for raising a feminist son makes the growth potential for this project enormous.

 

How did this project start?

I started P.I.N.K. Backpack determined to build a growth-focused business using my U.C. Berkeley English degree, my professional writing experience, my parenting background, and my lifelong passion for women's rights -- which were simultaneously (and serendipitously!) gaining ground.
The writing part was easy to get started. The marketing...not so much. That was two years ago, nine guidebooks, and many, many marketing attempts. It's time to take this project to the next level and hopefully get us all a little closer to living in a fair world.

 

Where will your money go?

This project's mission is to get more guidebooks into the hands of more parents who can, in turn, fill more girls' "backpacks" with gender-equality guidance and confidence. Here is a breakdown of the funding needed to accomplish that goal.

 

What are customers saying?

 

Why is this project important?

Ironically, the current political situation has spawned a long-overdue movement toward gender parity - this project is a happy consequence of that irony. My hope is that these pocket guides will be the perfect conduit for helping parents guide girls toward the opportunities that are finally (rightfully!) becoming available to women.

Please note: All pocket guides are intentionally priced inexpensively on Amazon at .99 cents so they're accessible and affordable to everyone.

 

How can you help spread the word?

If you believe in helping empower the next generation of women and you're unable to make a monetary contribution, no worries, please help spread visibility of 'the resource for gender-equality parenting' by using the sharing icon links at the top of this page (to the right of the pink 'Back It' button).

Thank you so much!

story:
Calling all Basic Income supporters!

We're big fans of Basic Income and we're trying to spread the word and explain the idea and its benefits to as many people as possible.

I've already written a book about Basic Income;

...and with the assistance of a very helpful artist, I've started making videos to help explain the idea to a wider audience.

But with your help, we'd like to do lots more!

So, we're asking for your help to fund the production of a least five more videos.

If we get even more help, all proceeds will go towards the production and promotion of more Basic Income resources - such as a podcast, articles, more books and more videos.

Basic Income could help us build a kinder, better society for the future. Please play your part and help us to play ours.

Yours faithfully,

Robert Jameson
and
Katie Anne Remington

Please play your part and help us to play ours.Yours faithfully,Robert JamesonandKatie Anne Remington

story:
Shalom,

my name is Ron Yitzchak and I'm a Rabbi and Torah Scribe from Orlando Florida currently in Jerusalem.  The campaign to build up Israel's Air Force comes from my deep love for Israel.

adding another F-35 to Israel's arsenal makes a tremendous addition to the F-35 starter fleet. 

 

Israel Must Maintain The Best Air Force, Together We Can Make It Even Better!

 

  • The cost for the new F-35A Joint Strike Fighter Jet is just below US $80 million. The money would go to Lockheed Martin and the transaction would be under strict consent of the Pentagon and the Israel Ministry of Defense.
  • One Purchase of One Product for One Recipient delivered in a way that can be trusted.
  • Feel it next time you hear about another air raid strike on Iranian advanced guided missiles. 
  • Partial funds go to the IDF Air Force US Procurement Defense Budget if we don't reach our entire goal.

The Impact Of Another Stealth Fighter

The campaign focuses on Israel's expense for purchasing another full squadron of 50 F-35A Jets. The contribution of getting another stealth fighter right away makes a big difference

  • The project is valuable to everyone who loves Israel and wants peace in the world.
  • Take confidence in the successful track record of the Israel Air Force.
  • Money goes to a US company for a product that is built to trust.

 

    You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help:

    Help Make A Difference Today. For the first time individuals citizens can contribute directly to the Israeli Air Force specifically by buying for their arsenal one more F-35A Strike Fighter Jet.

    •  get your wallet out and make some thing big happen by supporting this campaign.
    • It would be great if you can remind anyone, tell your friends or share this with them.

    And thanks for all of your kind consideration.

story:
Short Summary

  • I am a Lutheran pastor full of love to give to all those faithful believers at heart. I have experience and my goal is to develop faithfully to my principles that God is love.
  • This campaign is important since, in Spain, there is still a Catholic monopoly, which has left in the collective imagination old ideas of their own. Although there are more and more evangelical churches in the country, there is still an extreme disparity in both rights and duties between the two Churches. Luckily, we have the Ferede (Federation of Evangelical Religious Entities of Spain), but we still have a long way to go.
  • With the adequate funding, we can rent a place and found a church dedicated to the main objectives of the campaign: women, whether heterosexual, lesbian or trans, as well as those believers who follow the principle that God is love.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Currently we need:
    a) Lease a place
    b) To raise public deed of the statutes of the Church
    c) Attach the Church to FEREDE
    d) Convert the rented place into a place of faith, as well as a social center where to help people who need it in the area
  • As rewards, apart from being a help in this noble project, we will put a stone slab with the names of those people who have helped. The slab will have a header on which will put "this project has been possible thanks to ..." and will be at the entrance of the Church so that anyone can read it and know thanks to who has been possible. We will send a photo when the slab stone is finished to every backer. Of course, there will be other perks, related to our Christian Mission.
  • The funds go, entirely, to the creation of the Church and everything that it entails: paperwork, rent, hiring if necessary, purchase of material, financing to help people (for example, in Barcelona, there are more than 6000 people homeless and many elderly people without resources to survive looking for sustenance in the garbage)

The Impact

  • Your contribution will help to found the Church for the purposes mentioned above. I am sure that, if you are a Christian, you will understand that this project will not only serve to strengthen Lutheranism in Spain but that it will help many people feel part of something as big as Christianity is. In addition, it will be a starting point for cultural activities and aid to the community.

Risks & Challenges

Among the risks and obstacles of the project:
a) Increase of the extreme right in the country due to the government
b) Pre-eminence of Catholicism and problems derived from it
c) Problems derived from the country's high rate of homophobia and transphobia (although it must be recognized that it has improved a lot in recent years)
d) Other issues related with the exposed above

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help in many other ways!

Just share this campaing to extend the word

If you live in Barcelona, contact us, your time and help will be welcomed.
